tika-vin05t:916_0: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā vā rakkhitagopitā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:916_1: sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā hoti,
tika-vin05t:916_4: Suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā rajjukā vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā
tika-vin05t:916_5: vā dvivaṭṭā vā saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:916_6: Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā ca bhājanīyā.
tika-vin05t:916_8: te attano karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā.
tika-vin05t:917_0: Yo koci antamaso aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ,
tika-vin05t:917_1: sopi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme ca dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:917_2: Pādagaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanadaṇḍako chattadaṇḍako chattasalākāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:917_4: Rakkhitagopitaṃ veḷuṃ gaṇhantena samakaṃ vā atirekaṃ vā thāvaraṃ antamaso taṃagghanakavallikāyapi phātikammaṃ katvā gahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:918_0: Tiṇanti muñjañca pabbajañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ yaṃ kiñci tiṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:918_4: Iti muñjādīsu yaṃ kiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ tiṇaṃ tālapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ
tika-vin05t:918_5: vā bahārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthuto jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:918_6: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:919_0: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu vā yaṃ kiñci dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:919_2: tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca niṭṭhite atirekaṃ puggalikakamme ca dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:920_0: Dārubhaṇḍe “yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍamattopi dārubhaṇḍako dārudullabhaṭṭhāne saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito,
tika-vin05t:920_2: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbampi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikatiṃ dārubhaṇḍena saṅgaṇhitvā āsandikato paṭṭhāya dārubhaṇḍe vinicchayo vutto.
tika-vin05t:920_4: āsandiko sattaṅgo bhaddapīṭhaṃ pīṭhikā ekapādakapīṭhaṃ āmaṇḍakavaṇṭakapīṭhaṃ phalakaṃ kocchaṃ palālapīṭhanti
tika-vin05t:920_5: imesu tāva yaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:920_9: vaṅkaphalakaṃ dīghaphalakaṃ cīvaradhovanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaro dantakaṭṭhacchedanagaṇṭhikā
tika-vin05t:920_10: daṇḍamuggaro ambaṇaṃ rajanadoṇi udakapaṭicchako dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi
tika-vin05t:920_11: samuggo mañjūsā pādagaṇhanakato atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo udakadoṇi udakakaṭāhaṃ uḷuṅko kaṭacchu pānīyasarāvaṃ
tika-vin05t:920_12: pānīyasaṅkhoti etesupi yaṃ kiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:921_0: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:921_2: Ādhārako pattapidhānaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanī caṅkoṭakaṃ pacchi yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti etesupi yaṃ kiñci khuddakaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:921_4: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci gehasambhārarūpaṃ yo koci kaṭasārako
tika-vin05t:921_5: yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ yaṃ kiñci akappiyacammaṃ,
tika-vin05t:921_11: Kurundiyaṃ pana “sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ cammaṃ garubhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:922_0: Udukkhalaṃ musalaṃ suppaṃ nisadaṃ nisadapoto pāsāṇadoṇi pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ turivemabhastādi sabbaṃ pesakārādibhaṇḍaṃ
tika-vin05t:922_1: sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍaṃ sabbaṃ cakkayuttakaṃ yānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
tika-vin05t:922_2: Mañcapādo mañcaaṭanī pīṭhapādo pīṭhaaṭanī vāsipharasuādīnaṃ daṇḍāti etesu yaṃ kiñci vippakatatacchanakammaṃ aniṭṭhitameva bhājanīyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:922_4: Anuññātavāsiyā pana daṇḍo chattamuṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā araṇisahitaṃ dhammakaraṇo pādagaṇhanakato
tika-vin05t:922_5: anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo lābukatumbaṃ lābughaṭo visāṇakatumbanti sabbamevetaṃ bhājanīyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:922_7: Hatthidanto vā yaṃ kiñci visāṇaṃ vā atacchitaṃ yathāgatameva bhājanīyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:922_9: Tacchitaniṭṭhitopi hiṅgukaraṇḍako gaṇṭhikā vidho añjanī añjanīsalākā udakapuñchanīti idaṃ sabbaṃ bhājanīyameva.
tika-vin05t:923_0: Mattikābhaṇḍe sabbaṃ manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ghaṭapīṭharādikulālabhājanaṃ pattakaṭāhaṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ
tika-vin05t:923_1: dhūmadānaṃ dīparukkhako dīpakapallikā cayaniṭṭhakā chadaniṭṭhakā thūpikāti saṅghassa dinnakālato paṭṭhāya
tika-vin05t:923_3: pādagaṇhanakato anatirittappamāṇo pana ghaṭako pattaṃ thālakaṃ kañcanako kuṇḍikāti idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin05t:923_5: evaṃ lohabhaṇḍepi kuṇḍikā bhājanīyakoṭṭhāsameva bhajatīti ayamettha anupubbikathā.
tika-vin05t:927_1: Codanādivinicchayoti ettha pana codetuṃ ko labhati,
tika-vin05t:927_3: Dubbalacodakavacanaṃ tāva gahetvā koci na labhati.
tika-vin05t:927_4: Dubbalacodako nāma sambahulesu kathāsallāpena nisinnesu eko ekaṃ ārabbha anodissakaṃ katvā pārājikavatthuṃ katheti,
tika-vin05t:927_5: añño taṃ sutvā itarassa gantvā āroceti,
tika-vin05t:927_6: so taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “tvaṃ kira maṃ idañcidañca vadasī”ti bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:927_8: kathāpavattiyaṃ pana mayā anodissakaṃ katvā vuttamatthi.
tika-vin05t:927_9: Sace ahaṃ tava imaṃ dukkhuppattiṃ jāneyyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:927_12: Tassetaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ gahetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ koci codetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:927_13: etaṃ pana aggahetvā sīlasampanno bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:927_14: sīlasampannā ca bhikkhunī bhikkhunīmeva codetuṃ labhatīti mahāpadumatthero āha.
tika-vin05t:927_16: Godattatthero “na koci na labhatī”ti vatvā “bhikkhussa sutvā codeti,
tika-vin05t:927_18: titthiyasāvakānaṃ sutvā codetī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ āhari.
tika-vin05t:927_19: Tiṇṇampi therānaṃ vāde cuditakasseva paṭiññāya kāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:928_0: Ayaṃ pana codanā nāma diṭṭhacodanā sutacodanā parisaṅkitacodanāti tividhā hoti.
tika-vin05t:928_1: Aparāpi catubbidhā hoti sīlavipatticodanā ācāravipatticodanā diṭṭhivipatticodanā ājīvavipatticodanāti.
tika-vin05t:928_2: Tattha garukānaṃ dvinnaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ vasena sīlavipatticodanā veditabbā,
tika-vin05t:928_5: ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vasena ājīvavipatticodanā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:929_0: Aparāpi catubbidhā hoti vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā saṃvāsapaṭikkhepo sāmīcipaṭikkhepoti.
tika-vin05t:929_1: Tattha vatthusandassanā nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi,
tika-vin05t:929_6: Saṃvāsapaṭikkhepo nāma “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavatto.
tika-vin05t:929_8: Taṃ paṭipāṭiyā vandanādīni karonto ekassa akatvā sesānaṃ karaṇakāle veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:930_3: ekaṃ dhammika”ntiādiṃ katvā yāva dasa adhammikāni pātimokkhaṭṭhapanāni,
tika-vin05t:930_8: parisaṅkāya codentassa dasuttarasatanti tiṃsādhikāni tīṇi satāni honti.
tika-vin05t:930_11: kāyavācāya codentassāti tiguṇāni katāni navutādhikāni nava satāni honti.
tika-vin05t:930_12: Tāni attanā codentassapi parena codāpentassapi tattakānevāti vīsatiūnāni dve sahassāni honti.
tika-vin05t:930_13: Puna diṭṭhādibhede samūlikāmūlikavasena anekasahassā codanā hontīti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:931_1: Vuttappabhedāsu pana imāsu codanāsu yāya kāyaci codanāya vasena saṅghamajjhe osaṭe vatthusmiṃ cuditakacodakā
tika-vin05t:931_8: “cetiyaṃ tāva vandathā”tiādīni vatvā dīghasuttaṃ katvā vissajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:931_9: Te ce cirarattaṃ kilantā pakkantaparisā upacchinnapakkhā hutvā puna yācanti,
tika-vin05t:931_12: Vinicchinantehi ca sace alajjussannā hoti parisā,
tika-vin05t:931_15: “tumhākaṃ sabhāge vinayadhare pariyesathā”ti vinayadhare pariyesāpetvā yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusāsanena taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati,
tika-vin05t:932_3: Tasmā codakena vatthusmiṃ ārocite cuditako pucchitabbo “santametaṃ, no”ti.
tika-vin05t:932_4: Evaṃ vatthuṃ upaparikkhitvā bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā ñattisampadāya ca anussāvanasampadāya ca taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:932_6: so ca alajjī bālo hoti abyatto,
tika-vin05t:932_12: na yuttaṃ tayā evarūpena bālena paraṃ codetu”nti uyyojetabbo,
tika-vin05t:932_14: Sace pana so alajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto,
tika-vin05t:932_15: diṭṭhena vā sutena vā ajjhottharitvā sampādetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:932_16: etassa anuyogaṃ datvā lajjisseva paṭiññāya kammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:933_1: so ca lajjī bālo hoti abyatto,
tika-vin05t:933_3: tassa nayo dātabbo “kimhi naṃ codesi sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiādīsu vā ekissā”ti.
tika-vin05t:933_4: Kasmā pana imasseva evaṃ nayo dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:933_10: Alajjiniggahatthāya hi lajjipaggahatthāya ca sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ.
tika-vin05t:933_11: Tatra alajjī nayaṃ labhitvā ajjhottharanto ehiti,
tika-vin05t:933_12: lajjī pana nayaṃ labhitvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhasantānena sute sutasantānena patiṭṭhāya kathessati,
tika-vin05t:933_14: Sace pana so lajjī paṇḍito hoti byatto,
tika-vin05t:934_1: tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero kira lohapāsādassa heṭṭhā bhikkhūnaṃ vinayaṃ kathetvā sāyanhasamaye vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:934_2: tassa vuṭṭhānasamaye dve attapaccatthikā kathaṃ pavattesuṃ.
tika-vin05t:934_5: atha appāvasese paṭhamayāme therassa tasmiṃ puggale “ayaṃ patiṭṭhāya katheti,
tika-vin05t:934_8: addhā etaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti asuddhaladdhi uppannā.
tika-vin05t:934_9: Tato bījanīdaṇḍakena pādakathalikāya saññaṃ datvā “ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:934_16: vinicchinituṃ anurūpena vinayadharena nāma tumhādiseneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:934_17: codakena ca īdiseneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā setakāni nivāsetvā “ciraṃ kilamitāttha mayā”ti khamāpetvā pakkāmi.
tika-vin05t:935_0: Evaṃ lajjinā codiyamāno alajjī bahūsupi vatthūsu uppannesu paṭiññaṃ na deti,
tika-vin05t:935_4: Sace panassa aññampi tādisaṃ vatthu uppajjati,
tika-vin05t:935_10: Itarampi tatheva vatvā “ubhopi ekasambhogaparibhogā hutvā jīvathā”ti uyyojetabbā.
tika-vin05t:935_12: pattacīvarapariveṇādiatthāya pana patirūpaṃ sakkhiṃ labhitvā kātabboti.
tika-vin05t:936_1: vivādo ca nesaṃ kismiñcideva appamattako hoti,
tika-vin05t:936_2: saññāpetvā “mā evaṃ karothā”ti accayaṃ desāpetvā uyyojetabbā.
tika-vin05t:936_3: Atha panettha cuditakena sahasā viraddhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:936_5: So ca pakkhānurakkhaṇatthāya paṭiññaṃ na deti,
tika-vin05t:936_8: so tesaṃ paṭiññāya ekavāraṃ dvevāraṃ suddho hotu,
tika-vin05t:936_9: atha pana viraddhakālato paṭṭhāya ṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:937_1: Adinnādānavatthuṃ vinicchinantena pana pañcavīsati avahārā sādhukaṃ sallakkhetabbā.
tika-vin05t:937_2: Tesu ca kusalena vinayadharena otiṇṇaṃ vatthuṃ sahasā avinicchinitvāva pañca ṭhānāni oloketabbāni,
tika-vin05t:940_1: Avahārakena hi “mayā idaṃ nāma avahaṭa”nti vuttepi āpattiṃ anāropetvāva taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ “sasāmikaṃ vā asāmikaṃ vā”ti upaparikkhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:940_2: Sasāmikepi sāmikānaṃ sālayabhāvo vā nirālayabhāvo vā upaparikkhitabbo.
tika-vin05t:940_7: Bhaṇḍasāmikesu pana bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpentesu bhaṇḍaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:941_1: bhātiyarājakāle kira mahācetiyapūjāya dakkhiṇadisato eko bhikkhu sattahatthaṃ paṇḍukāsāvaṃ aṃse karitvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pāvisi.
tika-vin05t:941_4: Atha so bhikkhu janasammaddapīḷito aṃsato patantaṃ kāsāvaṃ adisvāva nikkhanto,
tika-vin05t:941_5: nikkhamitvā kāsāvaṃ apassanto “ko īdise janasammadde kāsāvaṃ lacchati,
tika-vin05t:941_6: na dāni taṃ mayha”nti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā gato.
tika-vin05t:941_7: Athañño bhikkhu pacchā āgacchanto taṃ kāsāvaṃ disvā theyyacittena gahetvā puna vippaṭisārī hutvā “assamaṇo dānimhi,
tika-vin05t:941_8: vibbhamissāmī”ti citte uppanne “vinayadhare pucchitvā ñassāmī”ti cintesi.
tika-vin05t:942_0: Tena samayena cūḷasumanatthero nāma sabbapariyattidharo vinayācariyapāmokkho mahāvihāre paṭivasati.
tika-vin05t:942_1: So bhikkhu theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā okāsaṃ kāretvā attano kukkuccaṃ pucchi.
tika-vin05t:942_2: Thero tena bhaṭṭhe janakāye pacchā āgantvā gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi dāni ettha okāso”ti cintetvā āha “sace kāsāvasāmikaṃ bhikkhuṃ āneyyāsi,
tika-vin05t:942_3: sakkā bhaveyya tava patiṭṭhā kātu”nti. Kathāhaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:942_6: So pañcapi mahāvihāre oloketvā neva addakkhi.
tika-vin05t:942_7: Tato naṃ thero pucchi “katarāya disāya bahū bhikkhū āgacchantī”ti?
tika-vin05t:942_10: Tena hi kāsāvaṃ dīghato ca tiriyañca minitvā ṭhapehi,
tika-vin05t:942_11: ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇadisāya vihārapaṭipāṭiyā vicinitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ānehīti.
tika-vin05t:942_12: So tathā katvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā therassa santikaṃ ānesi.
tika-vin05t:942_17: Thero tena kataṃ dhuranikkhepaṃ sutvā itaraṃ pucchi “tayā idaṃ kuhiṃ disvā gahita”nti?
tika-vin05t:942_19: Tato taṃ thero āha “sace te suddhacittena gahitaṃ abhavissa,
tika-vin05t:942_23: idañca kāsāvaṃ attano santakaṃ katvā etasseva bhikkhuno dehī”ti.
tika-vin05t:942_24: So bhikkhu amateneva abhisitto varamassāsappatto ahosi.
tika-vin05t:943_1: Tadeva hi bhaṇḍaṃ kadāci appagghaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:943_3: Tasmā taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yasmiṃ kāle avahaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:943_4: tasmiṃyeva kāle yo tassa aggho hoti,
tika-vin05t:944_2: tasmiṃyeva dese yo tassa aggho hoti,
tika-vin05t:945_1: antarasamudde kira eko bhikkhu susaṇṭhānaṃ nāḷikeraṃ labhitvā bhamaṃ āropetvā saṅkhathālakasadisaṃ manoramaṃ
tika-vin05t:945_2: pānīyathālakaṃ katvā tattheva ṭhapetvā cetiyagiriṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin05t:945_3: Añño bhikkhu antarasamuddaṃ gantvā tasmiṃ vihāre paṭivasanto taṃ thālakaṃ disvā theyyacittena gahetvā cetiyagirimeva āgato.
tika-vin05t:945_4: Tassa tattha yāguṃ pivantassa taṃ thālakaṃ disvā thālakasāmiko bhikkhu āha “kuto te idaṃ laddha”nti.
tika-vin05t:945_8: Tattha ca vinicchayaṃ alabhitvā mahāvihāraṃ agamiṃsu,
tika-vin05t:945_9: tattha ca bheriṃ paharāpetvā mahācetiyasamīpe sannipātaṃ katvā vinicchayaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
tika-vin05t:946_0: Tasmiñca sannipāte ābhidhammikagodattatthero nāma vinayakusalo hoti,
tika-vin05t:946_1: so evamāha “iminā idaṃ thālakaṃ kuhiṃ avahaṭa”nti?
tika-vin05t:946_5: Tatra hi nāḷikeraṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ khāditvā kapālaṃ chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin05t:946_7: Imassa bhikkhuno ettha hatthakammaṃ kiṃ agghatīti?
tika-vin05t:946_9: Atthi pana katthaci sammāsambuddhena māsake vā ūnamāsake vā pārājikaṃ paññattanti.
tika-vin05t:946_12: Tena ca samayena bhātiyarājāpi cetiyavandanatthaṃ nagarato nikkhanto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā
tika-vin05t:946_13: sabbaṃ paṭipāṭiyā sutvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi “mayi sante bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi gihīnampi adhikaraṇaṃ
tika-vin05t:947_3: Yathā navadhoto patto aṭṭha vā dasa vā agghati,
tika-vin05t:947_4: so pacchā bhinno vā chiddo vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato vā appaggho hoti,
tika-vin05t:947_5: tasmā na sabbadā bhaṇḍaṃ pakatiaggheneva kātabbanti.
tika-vin05t:948_3: sace koci kassaci pādagghanakaṃ vāsiṃ harati,
tika-vin05t:948_4: tatra vāsisāmiko pucchitabbo “tayā ayaṃ vāsi kittakena kītā”ti? “Pādena,
tika-vin05t:948_8: Sace vadati “ekadivasaṃ me dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā rajanachalli vā pattapacanakadāru vā chinnaṃ,
tika-vin05t:948_12: evaṃ añjaniyā vā añjanisalākāya vā kuñcikāya vā palālena vā thusehi vā iṭṭhakacuṇṇena vā ekavāraṃ ghaṃsitvā dhovitamattenapi aggho bhassati.
tika-vin05t:948_14: udakasāṭakassa sakiṃ nivāsanapārupanenapi paribhogasīsena aṃse vā sīse vā ṭhapanamattenapi,
tika-vin05t:948_15: taṇḍulādīnaṃ papphoṭanenapi tato ekaṃ vā dve vā apanayanenapi antamaso ekaṃ pāsāṇasakkharaṃ uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenapi,
tika-vin05t:948_16: sappitelādīnaṃ bhājanantarapaavattanenapi antamaso tato makkhikaṃ vā kipillikaṃ vā uddharitvā chaḍḍitamattenapi,
tika-vin05t:948_17: guḷapiṇḍakassa madhurabhāvajānanatthaṃ nakhena vijjhitvā aṇumattaṃ gahitamattenapi aggho bhassati.
tika-vin05t:948_18: Tasmā yaṃ kiñci pādagghanakaṃ vuttanayeneva sāmikehi paribhogena ūnaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:948_19: na taṃ avahaṭo bhikkhu pārājikena kātabboti.
tika-vin05t:949_0: Evaṃ imāni tulayitvā pañca ṭhānāni dhāreyya atthaṃ vicakkhaṇo,
tika-vin05t:949_1: āpattiṃ vā anāpattiṃ vā garukaṃ vā lahukaṃ vā āpattiṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapeyyāti.
tika-vin05t:950_0: “Sikkhāpadaṃ samaṃ tena, aññaṃ kiñci na vijjati;
tika-vin05t:959_0: Vīmaṃsitvātha viññūhi, saṃsanditvā ca taṃ vade.
tika-vin05t:963_0: Aggiṃ viya ca sampassaṃ, nāmaseyya vicakkhaṇo”ti. ;
tika-vin05t:964_6: katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti imāni cha ṭhānāni visodhetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:964_7: Sace hi koci bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammādhigamaṃ byākareyya,
tika-vin05t:964_9: imesaṃ pana channaṃ ṭhānānaṃ sodhanatthaṃ evaṃ vattabbo “kiṃ te adhigataṃ,
tika-vin05t:964_15: “aniccalakkhaṇādīsu kiṃ dhuraṃ katvā aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu rūpārūpaajjhattabahiddhādibhedesu vā dhammesu kena mukhena abhinivisitvā”ti.
tika-vin05t:964_29: Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma me okāse adhigata”nti vadati,
tika-vin05t:964_33: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena pahīnā kilesā pākaṭā honti.
tika-vin05t:965_0: Sace “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:965_7: Bahussutā hi uggahaparipucchākusalā bhikkhū imāni cha ṭhānāni sodhetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-vin05t:965_10: “imāya paṭipadāya lokuttaradhammo nāma na labbhatī”ti apanetabbo.
tika-vin05t:965_12: dīgharattaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu appamatto jāgariyamanuyutto catūsu paccayesu alaggo ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā viharatīti paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:965_13: tassa bhikkhuno byākaraṇaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati.
tika-vin05t:965_15: evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī paṭipadā,
tika-vin05t:965_16: saṃsandati nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:965_17: Apica kho na ettakenapi sakkāro kātabbo. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:965_18: Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassapi sato khīṇāsavassa paṭipattisadisā paṭipatti hoti,
tika-vin05t:965_19: tasmā so bhikkhu tehi tehi upāyehi uttāsetabbo.
tika-vin05t:965_20: Khīṇāsavassa nāma asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā na hoti,
tika-vin05t:966_1: dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi.
tika-vin05t:966_2: So taṃ nahāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā pāde aggahesi.
tika-vin05t:967_0: Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko vihāreyeva acchati.
tika-vin05t:967_1: Rājā “theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi.
tika-vin05t:967_2: Thero silāthambho viya niccalo hutvā “ko etthā”ti āha. “Ahaṃ, bhante, tisso”ti?
tika-vin05t:968_0: Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo.
tika-vin05t:968_2: Vasabharājāpi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ maddamāno nisīdi.
tika-vin05t:968_6: dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti,
tika-vin05t:968_7: tasmā imehi upāyehi pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā rasataṇhā vā uppajjati,
tika-vin05t:968_9: Sace pana abhīru acchambhī anutrāsī hutvā sīho viya nisīdati,
tika-vin05t:968_11: ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇo samantā rājarājamahāmattādīhi pesitaṃ sakkāraṃ arahatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:969_0: 234. Sakale pana vinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:974_0: Suttānulomaṃ nāma cattāro mahāpadesā. Ye bhagavatā evaṃ vuttā –
tika-vin05t:976_0: Ācariyavādo nāma dhammasaṅgāhakehi pañcahi arahantasatehi ṭhapitā pāḷivinimuttā okkantavinicchayappavattā aṭṭhakathātanti.
tika-vin05t:977_0: Attanomati nāma suttasuttānulomaācariyavāde muñcitvā anumānena attano anubuddhiyā nayaggāhena upaṭṭhitākārakathanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:978_0: Apica suttantābhidhammavinayaṭṭhakathāsu āgato sabbopi theravādo attanomati nāma.
tika-vin05t:978_1: Taṃ pana attanomatiṃ gahetvā kathentena na daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā voharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:978_5: Sace tattha otarati ceva sameti ca,
tika-vin05t:980_8: Tehi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā suttānulomaṃ sutte otāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:980_15: Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā ācariyavādo sutte otāretabbo.
tika-vin05t:980_18: Anotaranto asamento ca gārayhācariyavādo na gahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:980_22: Tehipi aññamaññaṃ khepaṃ vā garahaṃ vā akatvā attanomati sutte otāretabbā.
tika-vin05t:981_8: bāhirakasuttaṃ vā hoti siloko vā aññaṃ vā gārayhasuttaṃ guḷhavessantaraguḷhavinayavedallādīnaṃ aññatarato ābhataṃ,
tika-vin05t:983_21: Sabbaṭṭhānesu ca khepo vā garahā vā na kātabbāti.
tika-vin05t:984_7: Athāyaṃ tassa kappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
tika-vin05t:984_10: Atha paro tassa akappiyabhāvasādhakaṃ suttato bahuṃ kāraṇañca vinicchayañca dasseti,
tika-vin05t:984_11: anena attano gahaṇanti katvā daḷhaṃ ādāya na ṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:985_10: Atha paro bahūhi suttavinicchayakāraṇehi kappiyabhāvaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin05t:985_15: Yathā cāyaṃ kappiyākappiye akappiyakappiye ca vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin05t:986_0: Evaṃ kappiyākappiyādivinicchaye uppanne yo suttasuttānulomaācariyavādaattanomatīsu atirekakāraṇaṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:986_2: sabbaso pana kāraṇavinicchayaṃ alabhantena suttaṃ na jahitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:986_4: Evaṃ sakalavinayavinicchaye kosallaṃ patthayantena ayaṃ catubbidho vinayo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:987_0: Imañca pana catubbidhaṃ vinayaṃ ñatvāpi vinayadharena puggalena tilakkhaṇasamannāgatena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:987_3: Suttañcassa svāgataṃ hoti suppavatti suvinicchitaṃ suttato anubyañjanasoti idamekaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:987_4: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hoti asaṃhīroti idaṃ dutiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:987_5: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritāti idaṃ tatiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:988_3: Suvinicchitaṃ suttaso anubyañjanasoti pāḷito ca paripucchato ca aṭṭhakathāto ca suvinicchitaṃ hoti kaṅkhāchedanaṃ katvā uggahitaṃ.
tika-vin05t:988_4: Vinaye kho pana ṭhito hotīti vinaye lajjibhāvena patiṭṭhito hoti.
tika-vin05t:988_5: Alajjī hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṃ visaṃvādetvā uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṃ upaddavaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:988_7: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṃ avisaṃvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva dīpeti,
tika-vin05t:988_9: Tathā hi pubbe mahātherā tikkhattuṃ vācaṃ nicchāresuṃ “anāgate lajjī rakkhissati,
tika-vin05t:988_13: so vinayaṃ avijahanto avokkamanto lajjibhāveneva vinaye ṭhito hoti suppatiṭṭhitoti.
tika-vin05t:989_0: Asaṃhīroti saṃhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhato vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno
tika-vin05t:989_5: Yo pana pāḷiyaṃ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā heṭṭhupariyena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-vin05t:989_6: ekekalomaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya “evaṃ mayaṃ vadāma,
tika-vin05t:989_8: yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ agacchanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:990_0: Ācariyaparamparā kho panassa suggahitā hotīti theraparamparā vaṃsaparamparā assa suṭṭhu gahitā hoti.
tika-vin05t:990_3: Sūpadhāritāti suṭṭhu upadhāritā pubbāparānusandhito atthato kāraṇato ca upadhāritā.
tika-vin05t:990_6: so asukassā”ti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ theravādaṅgaṃ haritvā yāva upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhīti pāpetvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin05t:990_7: tatopi āharitvā upālitthero sammāsambuddhassa santike uggaṇhi,
tika-vin05t:990_11: moggaliputtatissatthero attano upajjhāyassa siggavattherassa caṇḍavajjittherassa cāti evaṃ sabbaṃ ācariyaparamparaṃ
tika-vin05t:990_12: theravādaṅgaṃ āharitvā attano ācariyaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti.
tika-vin05t:990_13: Evaṃ uggahitā hi ācariyaparamparā suggahitā hoti.
tika-vin05t:990_14: Evaṃ asakkontena pana avassaṃ dve tayo parivaṭṭā uggahetabbā.
tika-vin05t:990_15: Sabbapacchimena hi nayena yathā ācariyo ācariyācariyo ca pāḷiñca paripucchañca vadanti,
tika-vin05t:991_0: Imehi ca pana tīhi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatena vinayadharena vatthuvinicchayatthaṃ sannipatite saṅghe otiṇṇe
tika-vin05t:991_1: vatthusmiṃ codakena ca cuditakena ca vutte vattabbe sahasā avinicchinitvāva cha ṭhānāni oloketabbāni.
tika-vin05t:992_0: Vatthuṃ olokentopi hi “tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:992_3: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ ekaccaṃ āpattiṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:992_4: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:993_0: Mātikaṃ olokentopi “sampajānamusāvāde pācittiya”ntiādinā nayena pañcannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:993_1: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:994_0: Padabhājanīyaṃ olokentopi “akkhayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-vin05t:994_2: Yebhuyyena khayite sarīre methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati,
tika-vin05t:994_3: āpatti thullaccayassā”tiādinā nayena sattannaṃ āpattīnaṃ aññataraṃ āpattiṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:994_4: so padabhājanīyato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:995_0: Tikaparicchedaṃ olokentopi tikasaṅghādisesaṃ vā tikapācittiyaṃ vā tikadukkaṭaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpattiṃ tikaparicchede passati,
tika-vin05t:995_1: so tato suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:996_1: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evaṃ yā sikkhāpadantaresu antarāpatti hoti,
tika-vin05t:996_3: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:997_4: na mocanādhippāyassa asañcicca asatiyā ajānantassā”ti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade niddiṭṭhaṃ anāpattiṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:997_5: so taṃ suttaṃ ānetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati.
tika-vin05t:998_0: Yo hi bhikkhu catubbidhavinayakovido tilakkhaṇasampanno imāni cha ṭhānāni oloketvā adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasamessati,
tika-vin05t:998_1: tassa vinicchayo appaṭivattiyo buddhena sayaṃ nisīditvā vinicchitasadiso hoti.
tika-vin05t:998_2: Taṃ ce evaṃ vinicchayakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ koci katasikkhāpadavītikkamo bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā attano kukkuccaṃ puccheyya,
tika-vin05t:998_3: tena sādhukaṃ sallakkhetvā sace anāpatti hoti,
tika-vin05t:998_16: tasmā visesena taṃvatthukaṃ kukkuccaṃ pucchiyamāno “āpattī”ti avatvā sacassa ācariyo dharati,
tika-vin05t:998_17: tato tena so bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyaṃ pucchā”ti pesetabbo.
tika-vin05t:998_18: Sace so puna āgantvā “tumhākaṃ ācariyo suttato nayato oloketvā ‘satekiccho’ti maṃ āhā”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:998_19: tato tena so “sādhu suṭṭhu yaṃ ācariyo bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:998_23: tassa santikaṃ pesetabbo “amhehi saha uggahitatthero gaṇapāmokkho,
tika-vin05t:998_25: Tenapi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t:998_29: Tenapi “satekiccho”ti vinicchite “sādhu suṭṭhu tassa vacanaṃ karohī”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t:998_33: tato dullabhatarā pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca.
tika-vin05t:998_34: Evaṃ pana vattabbo “vivittaṃ okāsaṃ sammajjitvā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā sīlāni visodhetvā dvattiṃsākāraṃ tāva manasikarohī”ti.
tika-vin05t:998_40: so divasātikkame upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato evaṃ vattabbo “kīdisā te cittappavattī”ti.
tika-vin05t:998_41: Ārocitāya ca cittapavattiyā vattabbo “pabbajjā nāma cittavisuddhatthāya,
tika-vin05t:999_6: Ārocitāya cittapavattiyā “natthi loke raho nāma pāpakammaṃ pakubbato.
tika-vin05t:999_8: Athassa ārakkhadevatā paracittavidū samaṇabrāhmaṇā aññā ca devatā jānanti,
tika-vin05t:999_9: tvaṃyeva dāni tava sotthiṃ pariyesāhī”ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t:999_10: Evaṃ katavītikkameneva bhikkhunā sayameva āgantvā ārocite paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1000_1: Idāni yā sā pubbe vuttappabhedā codanā,
tika-vin05t:1000_2: tassāyeva sampattivipattijānanatthaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānādīnaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1000_8: karotu me āyasmā okāsa”nti evaṃ okāsakammaṃ ādi.
tika-vin05t:1000_9: Otiṇṇena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā vinicchayo majjhe.
tika-vin05t:1000_10: Āpattiyaṃ vā anāpattiyaṃ vā patiṭṭhāpanena samatho pariyosānaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1001_3: Codanāya dve mūlāni samūlikā vā amūlikā vā.
tika-vin05t:1001_15: Imāya ca pana codanāya codakena puggalena “parisuddhakāyasamācāro nu khomhī”tiādinā nayena upālipañcakesu vuttesu pannarasasu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1001_16: Cuditakena dvīsu dhammesu patiṭṭhātabbaṃ sacce ca akuppe cāti.
tika-vin05t:1002_0: Anuvijjakena ca codako pucchitabbo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1002_6: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “sīlavipattiyā vā codemi,
tika-vin05t:1002_12: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “jānāmi kho ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1002_20: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “cattāri pārājikāni terasa saṅghādisesā,
tika-vin05t:1003_0: So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1003_5: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “diṭṭhena vā codemi,
tika-vin05t:1003_8: So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1003_16: thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho,
tika-vin05t:1004_0: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “na kho ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1004_3: So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1004_11: thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpannoti sutaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1005_0: So ce evaṃ vadeyya “na kho ahaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1005_3: So evamassa vacanīyo “yaṃ kho tvaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1005_10: saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpannoti parisaṅkasi,
tika-vin05t:1006_0: Diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhena sameti, diṭṭhena saṃsandate diṭṭhaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1009_0: Sutaṃ sutena sameti, sutena saṃsandate sutaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1012_0: Mutaṃ mutena sameti, mutena saṃsandate mutaṃ;
tika-vin05t:1015_0: Paṭiññā lajjīsu katā, alajjīsu evaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin05t:1017_0: Apicettha saṅgāmāvacarena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamantena nīcacittena saṅgho upasaṅkamitabbo rajoharaṇasamena cittena,
tika-vin05t:1017_2: there bhikkhū anupakhajjantena nave bhikkhū āsanena appaṭibāhantena yathāpatirūpe āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1018_0: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena na upajjhāyo pucchitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1018_14: peme vā sati dose vā chandāpi gaccheyya dosāpi gaccheyya mohāpi gaccheyya bhayāpi gaccheyyāti.
tika-vin05t:1019_0: Saṅghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukāmena saṅghagarukena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1020_1: yugamattaṃ pekkhantena atthaṃ anuvidhiyantena sake āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1020_20: vuttaṃ ahāpentena avuttaṃ appakāsentena otiṇṇāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā paro paripucchitvā yathāpaṭiññāya kāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1020_29: majjhattena bhavitabbaṃ dhammesu ca puggalesu ca,
tika-vin05t:1020_30: evañca pana anuvijjako anuvijjamāno satthu ceva sāsanakaro hoti,
tika-vin05t:1020_31: viññūnañca sabrahmacārīnaṃ piyo ca hoti manāpo ca garu ca bhāvanīyo cāti.
tika-vin05t:1024_2: Tattha tividho parivāso paṭicchannaparivāso suddhantaparivāso samodhānaparivāsoti.
tika-vin05t:1024_3: Tesu paṭicchannaparivāso tāva yathāpaṭicchannāya āpattiyā dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1024_8: Tasmā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ tāva paṭicchannabhāvo jānitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1024_9: Ayañhi āpatti nāma dasahākārehi paṭicchannā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1025_6: Tattha āpatti ca hoti āpattisaññī cāti yaṃ āpanno,
tika-vin05t:1025_13: Anāpatti pana āpattisaññāyapi anāpattisaññāyapi chādentena acchāditāva hoti,
tika-vin05t:1025_14: lahukaṃ vā garukāti garukaṃ vā lahukāti chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1026_3: Atha “mayhaṃ saṅghena kammaṃ kata”nti apakatattasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1026_5: Apakatattena pana pakatattasaññinā vā apakatattasaññinā vā chāditāpi acchannāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1029_0: Na bhikkhunī no ca phuseyya vajjaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1032_0: Anantarāyikoti yassa dasasu antarāyesu ekopi natthi,
tika-vin05t:1032_3: Sacepi so bhīrujātikatāya andhakāre amanussacaṇḍamigabhayena antarāyikasaññī hutvā chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1032_5: Yassapi pabbatavihāre vasantassa kandaraṃ vā nadiṃ vā atikkamitvā ārocetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1032_9: etasmiṃ pana satiyeva antarāye antarāyikasaññī chādeti,
tika-vin05t:1033_0: Pahūti so sakkoti bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantuñceva ārocetuñca,
tika-vin05t:1033_3: Sacassa mukhe appamattako gaṇḍo vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1033_7: tāvatakena pana neva vattuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1033_12: Appahunā pana vattuṃ vā gantuṃ vā asamatthena pahusaññinā vā appahusaññinā vā chāditā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1034_0: Chādetukāmo ca hoti chādeti cāti idaṃ uttānatthameva.
tika-vin05t:1034_1: Sace pana “chādessāmī”ti dhuranikkhepaṃ katvā purebhatte vā pacchābhatte vā paṭhamayāmādīsu vā lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā antoaruṇeyeva āroceti,
tika-vin05t:1034_3: Yassa pana abhikkhuke ṭhāne vasantassa āpajjitvā sabhāgassa bhikkhuno āgamanaṃ āgamentassa,
tika-vin05t:1034_4: sabhāgassa santikaṃ vā gacchantassa aḍḍhamāsopi māsopi atikkamati,
tika-vin05t:1034_7: Yo pana āpannamattova aggiṃ akkantapuriso viya sahasā pakkamitvā sabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āvikaroti,
tika-vin05t:1034_8: ayaṃ na chādetukāmova na chādeti nāma.
tika-vin05t:1034_9: Sace pana sabhāgaṃ disvāpi “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti lajjāya nāroceti,
tika-vin05t:1034_14: Yo pana visabhāgo hoti sutvā pakāsetukāmo,
tika-vin05t:1035_0: Tattha purebhattaṃ vā āpattiṃ āpanno hotu pacchābhattaṃ vā divā vā rattiṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1035_5: sabhāgasaṅghādisesaṃ āpannassa pana santike āvikātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1035_10: Āvikaronto ca “tuyhaṃ santike ekaṃ āpattiṃ āvikaromī”ti vā “ācikkhāmī”ti vā ārocemī”ti vā “mama ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpannabhāvaṃ jānāhī”ti vā vadatu,
tika-vin05t:1035_12: sabbehipi ākārehi appaṭicchannāva hotīti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1036_1: Iti imāni dasa kāraṇāni upaparikkhitvā paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena paṭhamameva paṭicchannabhāvo jānitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1036_2: tato paṭicchannadivase ca āpattiyo ca sallakkhetvā sace ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti, “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1036_3: ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjiṃ sañcetanikaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ ekāhappaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ yācāpetvā khandhake āgatanayeneva kammavācaṃ vatvā parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1036_9: cuddasāhappaṭicchanna”nti evaṃ yāva cuddasadivasāni divasavasena yojanā kātabbā,
tika-vin05t:1036_22: atirekasaṭṭhisaṃvaccharapaṭicchanna”nti vā tato vā bhiyyopi vatvā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1037_0: Sace pana dve tisso tatuttari vā āpattiyo honti,
tika-vin05t:1037_4: Tato paraṃ pana sataṃ vā hotu sahassaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1037_7: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin05t:1037_13: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ nānāvatthukā ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ vatthukittanavasena vā “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1037_14: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ nāmamattavasena vā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1037_18: Tasmā “sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo”ti evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇanāmavasenapi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1037_19: Idañhi parivāsādivinayakammaṃ vatthuvasena gottavasena nāmavasena āpattivasena ca kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1038_2: Tattha “sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ kāyasaṃsagga”ntiādinā vacanenapi “nānāvatthukāyo”ti vacanenapi vatthu ceva gottañca gahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1038_3: “Saṅghādiseso”ti vacanenapi “āpattiyo”ti vacanenapi nāmañceva āpatti ca gahitā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1038_4: Tasmā etesu yassa kassaci vasena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1038_5: Idha pana sabbāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇavasena sambahulanayeneva ca sabbattha kammavācaṃ yojetvā dassayissāma.
tika-vin05t:1038_6: Ekañhi āpattiṃ āpajjitvā “sambahulā”ti vinayakammaṃ karontassapi vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin05t:1038_7: Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā “ekaṃ āpajji”nti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin05t:1038_10: paṭicchannaparivāsaṃ dentena sace ekāhappaṭicchannā āpatti hoti.
tika-vin05t:1039_1: sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1039_2: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1039_5: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1039_8: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācāmīti –
tika-vin05t:1041_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1041_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1041_4: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:1042_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1042_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1042_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1042_4: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1044_0: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāso,
tika-vin05t:1045_0: Evaṃ yo yo āpanno hoti, tassa tassa nāmaṃ gahetvā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1046_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “parivāsaṃ samādiyāmi,
tika-vin05t:1047_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1047_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1048_0: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1049_7: Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1049_8: māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1049_12: Ārocentena ca avasāne “vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1049_19: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye ekena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin05t:1049_20: aparikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1049_26: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:1049_31: Atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:1049_35: Sace so bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena pakkanto hoti,
tika-vin05t:1050_1: Evaṃ yattakāni divasāni āpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1050_2: tattakāni tato adhikatarāni vā kukkuccavinodanatthāya parivasitvā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ samādiyitvā mānattaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1050_3: Ayañhi vatte samādinne eva mānattāraho hoti nikkhittavattena parivutthattā.
tika-vin05t:1051_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1051_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1051_4: parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1051_8: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1051_12: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1053_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1053_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1053_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1053_4: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1053_6: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:1054_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1054_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1054_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1054_4: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1054_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1054_6: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1056_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1058_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca tena bhikkhunā māḷakasīmāyameva “mānattaṃ samādiyāmi,
tika-vin05t:1059_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1059_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1059_4: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1059_5: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1060_0: Evaṃ ārocetabbaṃ. Imañca pana atthaṃ gahetvā yāya kāyaci vācāya ārocetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1061_3: Māḷakato bhikkhūsu nikkhantesu ekassapi santike nikkhipituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1061_4: Māḷakato nikkhamitvā satiṃ paṭilabhantena sahagacchantassa santike nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1061_8: Ārocentena pana avasāne “vediyatīti maṃ āyasmā dhāretū”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1061_16: vuttanayeneva vattaṃ nikkhipitvā paccūsasamaye catūhi pañcahi vā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ parikkhittassa vihārassa parikkhepato,
tika-vin05t:1061_17: aparikkhittassa parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato dve leḍḍupāte atikkamitvā mahāmaggato okkamma gumbena vā vatiyā vā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1061_19: Sace añño koci bhikkhu kenacideva karaṇīyena taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:1061_24: atha dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ okkamitvā ajānantasseva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:1061_27: Ārocitakālato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā sesehi sati karaṇīye gantumpi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1061_28: aruṇe uṭṭhite tassa bhikkhussa santike vattaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1061_29: Sace sopi kenaci kammena pure aruṇeyeva gacchati,
tika-vin05t:1061_30: aññaṃ vihārato nikkhantaṃ vā āgantukaṃ vā yaṃ paṭhamaṃ passati,
tika-vin05t:1061_32: Ayañca yasmā gaṇassa ārocetvā bhikkhūnañca atthibhāvaṃ sallakkhetvāva vasi,
tika-vin05t:1061_33: tenassa ūne gaṇe caraṇadoso vā vippavāso vā na hoti.
tika-vin05t:1062_1: Evaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ caritvā yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1062_5: pakatattassa ca abbhānaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1062_8: Tenapi vattaṃ samādiyitvā ārocetvā abbhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1063_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1063_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1063_4: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1063_5: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1065_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1065_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1065_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1065_4: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1065_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1066_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1066_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1066_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1066_4: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1066_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1068_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1070_0: Evaṃ tāva ekāhappaṭicchannāya āpattiyā paṭicchannaparivāso mānattadānaṃ abbhānañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1070_1: Imināva nayena dvīhādipaṭicchannāsupi tadanurūpā kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1071_2: parivāsaṃ adatvā mānattameva datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin05t:1072_1: sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1072_2: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1072_5: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1072_8: saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1074_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1074_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1074_4: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:1075_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1075_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1075_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1075_4: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1077_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1079_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca vattasamādānaṃ vattanikkhepo mānattacaraṇañca sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1080_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1080_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1082_0: Ekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā ārocentena paṭicchannamānatte vuttanayeneva ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1082_1: Ciṇṇamānatto ca yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhusaṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1083_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1083_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1083_4: sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto saṅghaṃ abbhānaṃ yācāmi. Ahaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1085_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1085_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1085_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1086_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1086_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1086_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1088_0: Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1089_0: Evaṃ kammavācaṃ vatvā abbhetabbo. Evaṃ appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1090_3: tassa paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ dentena appaṭicchannāpattiṃ
tika-vin05t:1091_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1091_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1091_5: sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1091_6: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1093_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1093_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1093_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1093_5: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1093_6: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1093_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,

tika-vin05t:1101_0: Samādinnamānattena ca anūnaṃ katvā vuttanayena chārattaṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.

tika-vin05t:1105_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji ekāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1105_2: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1105_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ ekāhappaṭicchannānaṃ ekāhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1105_5: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1105_6: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1105_7: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1107_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1110_3: Duvidhopi cesa rattiparicchedaṃ sakalaṃ vā ekaccaṃ vā ajānantassa ca assarantassa ca tattha vematikassa ca dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1110_4: Āpattipariyantaṃ pana “ettakā ahaṃ āpattiyo āpanno”ti jānātu vā mā vā,
tika-vin05t:1110_6: tattha yo upasampadato paṭṭhāya anulomakkamena vā ārocitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭilomakkamena vā “asukañca
tika-vin05t:1110_7: asukañca divasaṃ vā pakkhaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvaccharaṃ vā tava suddhabhāvaṃ jānāsī”ti pucchiyamāno “āma,  bhante, jānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1110_8: ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ahaṃ suddho”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:1111_0: Taṃ gahetvā parivasantena yattakaṃ kālaṃ attano suddhiṃ jānāti,
tika-vin05t:1111_1: tattakaṃ apanetvā avasesaṃ māsaṃ vā dvemāsaṃ vā parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1111_3: parivasanto ca puna aññaṃ māsaṃ sarati,
tika-vin05t:1111_20: Ekaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā “sambahulā”ti karontassa vuṭṭhāti ekaṃ vinā sambahulānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin05t:1111_21: Sambahulā pana āpajjitvā “ekaṃ āpajji”nti karontassa na vuṭṭhāti.
tika-vin05t:1112_0: Yo pana yathāvuttena anulomapaṭilomanayena pucchiyamānopi rattipariyantaṃ na jānāti nassarati,
tika-vin05t:1112_3: Taṃ gahetvā gahitadivasato paṭṭhāya yāva upasampadadivaso,
tika-vin05t:1112_7: Tasmā sace parivasanto rattiparicchede sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti “māso vā saṃvaccharo vā mayhaṃ āpannassā”ti,
tika-vin05t:1113_1: tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā
tika-vin05t:1113_2: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo –
tika-vin05t:1114_8: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1117_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji,
tika-vin05t:1117_8: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1117_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:1118_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji,
tika-vin05t:1118_8: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yācati,

tika-vin05t:1118_10: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1122_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1123_9: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1124_0: Ekassa dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā ārocanaṃ vuttanayameva. Parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ dentena –
tika-vin05t:1125_9: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1125_10: parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mārattaṃ yācāmī”ti –

tika-vin05t:1138_11: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1139_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji,
tika-vin05t:1139_8: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1139_9: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ suddhantaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1139_10: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1139_11: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1141_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1144_3: Tattha odhānasamodhāno nāma antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādentassa parivutthadivase odhunitvā makkhetvā
tika-vin05t:1144_4: purimāya āpattiyā mūladivasaparicchede pacchā āpannaṃ āpattiṃ samodahitvā dātabbaparivāso vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1145_1: yo paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivāsaṃ gahetvā parivasanto vā mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho
tika-vin05t:1145_2: vā anikkhittavatto aññaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā purimāya āpattiyā samā vā ūnatarā vā rattiyo paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1145_3: tassa mūlāyapaṭikassanena te parivutthadivase ca mānattaciṇṇadivase ca sabbe odhunitvā adivase katvā
tika-vin05t:1145_4: pacchā āpannāpattiṃ mūlaāpattiyaṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1145_12: Saṭṭhivassānipi parivasitvā mānattāraho hutvāpi hi ekadivasaṃ antarāpattiṃ paṭicchādetvā puna saṭṭhivassāni parivāsāraho hoti.
tika-vin05t:1145_13: Evaṃ mānattacārikamānattārahakālepi āpannāya āpattiyā mūlāyapaṭikassane kate mānattaciṇṇadivasāpi parivāsavutthadivasāpi sabbe makkhitāva honti.
tika-vin05t:1145_18: tasmā tassā āpattiyā visuṃ mānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1146_1: tattha kiṃ kātabba”nti vutte mahāsumatthero āha “atekiccho ayaṃ puggalo,
tika-vin05t:1146_4: nanu ayaṃ samuccayakkhandhako nāma buddhānaṃ ṭhitakālasadiso,
tika-vin05t:1146_5: āpatti nāma paṭicchannā vā hotu appaṭicchannā vā samakaūnataraatirekapaṭicchannā vā,
tika-vin05t:1146_8: taṃ mūlāpattiṃ katvā tattha itaraṃ samodhāya parivāso dātabbo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1147_0: Taṃ dentena paṭhamaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitvā pacchā parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1147_1: Sace koci bhikkhu pakkhapaṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasanto antarā anikkhittavattova puna pañcāhappaṭicchannaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin05t:1147_2: tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā
tika-vin05t:1147_3: ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo –
tika-vin05t:1148_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1148_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1148_4: sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1148_5: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1151_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1151_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1151_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1151_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1151_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1151_7: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikasseyya,
tika-vin05t:1152_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1152_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1152_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1152_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1152_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1152_6: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati,
tika-vin05t:1152_7: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā,
tika-vin05t:1154_0: “Paṭikassito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā,
tika-vin05t:1156_0: Evañca samodhānaparivāso dātabbo. Tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā…pe… evamassa vacanīyo –
tika-vin05t:1157_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1157_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1157_4: sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1157_5: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1157_6: taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1157_7: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yācāmī”ti.

tika-vin05t:1161_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1161_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,

tika-vin05t:1161_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1161_9: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1163_0: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāso,
tika-vin05t:1165_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne ca vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ pubbe vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1166_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1166_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1166_4: sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1166_5: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1166_6: taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,

tika-vin05t:1169_9: parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –

tika-vin05t:1180_6: taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1180_7: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1180_8: tassa me saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1180_9: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1180_10: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1182_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1182_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1182_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1182_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_6: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1182_7: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1182_9: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1182_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1183_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1183_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1183_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pañcāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1183_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_6: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1183_7: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pañcāhappaṭicchannānaṃ purimāsu āpattīsu samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1183_9: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1183_10: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1185_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1187_0: Sace mānattāraho vā mānattaṃ caranto vā abbhānāraho vā anikkhittavatto antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1187_1: vuttanayeneva purimāpattiyā antarāpattiyā ca divasaparicchedaṃ sallakkhetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya
tika-vin05t:1187_2: mūlāya paṭikassitvā parivāsaṃ datvā parivutthaparivāsassa mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1187_3: Sace pana paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasanto antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1187_6: Mūlāyapaṭikassanena pana parivutthadivasānaṃ makkhitattā puna ādito paṭṭhāya parivasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1187_7: Parivutthaparivāsassa ca mūlāpattiyā antarāpattiṃ samodhānetvā mānattaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1187_9: Mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ karontena tāva sace mūlāpatti pakkhapaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1188_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1188_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1188_4: sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1188_5: saṅghaṃ antarāsambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1190_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1190_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1190_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1190_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1190_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1190_7: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikasseyya,
tika-vin05t:1191_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji pakkhapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1191_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1191_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1191_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1191_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1191_6: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati,
tika-vin05t:1191_7: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā,
tika-vin05t:1193_1: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassanā khamati saṅghassa,
tika-vin05t:1195_0: Evaṃ mūlāya paṭikassitena puna ādito paṭṭhāya parivasitabbaṃ. Parivasantena ca –
tika-vin05t:1196_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1196_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1196_4: sohaṃ parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ paṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1196_5: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1196_6: taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1199_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,

tika-vin05t:1201_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1201_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1201_4: so parivasanto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,

tika-vin05t:1201_7: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1201_9: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,

tika-vin05t:1202_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāci,

tika-vin05t:1202_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1202_9: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1204_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ paṭicchannānañca appaṭicchannānañca chārattaṃ mānattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1206_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1207_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1207_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ pakkhapaṭicchannānaṃ pakkhaparivāsaṃ adāsi,

tika-vin05t:1207_5: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ,

tika-vin05t:1215_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1217_1: mūlāyapaṭikassanameva katvā mūlāpattiyā antarāpattiṃ samodhānetvā mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānattassa abbhānaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1217_2: Ettha pana “sohaṃ parivasanto”ti āgataṭṭhāne “sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso mānattāraho”ti vā “sohaṃ mānattaṃ
tika-vin05t:1217_3: caranto”ti vā “sohaṃ ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho”ti vā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1218_0: Sace pana appaṭicchannāya āpattiyā mānattaṃ caranto antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā na paṭicchādeti,
tika-vin05t:1218_1: so mūlāya paṭikassitvā antarāpattiyā puna mānattaṃ datvā ciṇṇamānatto abbhetabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin05t:1219_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1219_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1219_4: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1219_5: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1221_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1221_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1221_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1221_4: so mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1221_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1221_7: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikasseyya,
tika-vin05t:1222_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1222_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1222_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1222_4: so mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1222_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1222_6: saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassati,
tika-vin05t:1222_7: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā,
tika-vin05t:1224_1: antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanā khamati saṅghassa,
tika-vin05t:1227_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1227_3: tassa me saṅgho sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1227_4: sohaṃ mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1227_5: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1227_6: taṃ maṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1227_7: saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1229_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1229_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1229_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1229_4: so mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1229_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1229_6: taṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1229_7: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1229_9: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ dadeyya,
tika-vin05t:1230_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1230_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1230_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1230_4: so mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1230_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1230_6: taṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1230_7: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācati,
tika-vin05t:1230_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1230_9: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattassa dānaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1232_0: “Dinnaṃ saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1234_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne mānattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1235_2: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,

tika-vin05t:1241_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1241_2: so saṅghaṃ sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1241_3: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1241_4: so mānattaṃ caranto antarā sambahulā āpattiyo āpajji appaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1241_5: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1241_6: taṃ saṅgho antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ mūlāya paṭikassi,
tika-vin05t:1241_7: so saṅghaṃ antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1241_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno antarā sambahulānaṃ āpattīnaṃ appaṭicchannānaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1243_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1245_0: Abbhānārahakālepi antarāpattiṃ āpajjitvā appaṭicchādentassa imināva nayena mūlāyapaṭikassanā mānattadānaṃ abbhānañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1245_1: Kevalaṃ panettha “mānattaṃ caranto”ti avatvā “ciṇṇamānatto abbhānāraho”ti vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1247_1: Agghasamodhāno nāma sambahulāsu āpattīsu yā ekā vā dve vā tisso vā sambahulā vā āpattiyo sabbacirapaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1247_2: tāsaṃ agghena samodhāya tāsaṃ rattiparicchedavasena avasesānaṃ ūnatarapaṭicchannānaṃ āpattīnaṃ parivāso dīyati,
tika-vin05t:1247_5: aparampi sataṃ āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāti evaṃ dasakkhattuṃ katvā āpattisahassaṃ divasasataṃ paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1247_8: Evaṃ ekeneva dasāhena divasasatampi parivasitabbameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1251_1: sace kassaci bhikkhuno ekā āpatti ekāhappaṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1251_11: tena bhikkhunā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā…pe…
tika-vin05t:1252_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo sambahulā āpattiyo dvīhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1252_3: saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1255_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1255_3: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1255_6: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1256_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1256_3: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1256_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1256_7: yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1258_0: “Dinno saṅghena itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1260_0: Kammavācāpariyosāne vattasamādānādi sabbaṃ vuttanayameva. Ārocentena pana –
tika-vin05t:1261_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1261_3: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1261_5: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1264_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1264_3: sohaṃ saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1264_5: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1264_6: tāsaṃ agghena samodhānaparivāsaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1264_7: parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yācāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1266_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…

tika-vin05t:1274_5: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1274_7: sohaṃ parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāciṃ,
tika-vin05t:1274_8: tassa me saṅgho tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi, sohaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1276_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1276_3: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1276_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1276_7: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1276_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1277_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji sambahulā āpattiyo ekāhappaṭicchannāyo…pe…
tika-vin05t:1277_3: so saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1277_5: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ yā āpattiyo dasāhappaṭicchannāyo,
tika-vin05t:1277_7: so parivutthaparivāso saṅghaṃ tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ yāci,
tika-vin05t:1277_8: saṅgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ chārattaṃ mānattaṃ adāsi,
tika-vin05t:1279_0: “Abbhito saṅghena itthannāmo bhikkhu, khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1282_0: 245. Missakasamodhāno nāma – yo nānāvatthukā āpattiyo ekato katvā dīyati. Tatrāyaṃ nayo –
tika-vin05t:1283_1: sambahulā saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajjiṃ ekaṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ,
tika-vin05t:1284_0: Tikkhattuṃ yācāpetvā tadanurūpāya kammavācāya parivāso dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1285_0: Ettha ca “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji nānāvatthukāyo”tipi “saṅghādisesā āpattiyo āpajji”itipi evaṃ pubbe
tika-vin05t:1285_1: vuttanayena vatthuvasenapi gottavasenapi nāmavasenapi āpattivasenapi yojetvā kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva,
tika-vin05t:1285_2: tasmā na idha visuṃ kammavācaṃ yojetvā dassayissāma pubbe sabbāpattisādhāraṇaṃ katvā yojetvā dassitāya
tika-vin05t:1285_3: eva kammavācāya nānāvatthukāhipi āpattīhi vuṭṭhānasambhavato sāyevettha kammavācā alanti.
tika-vin05t:1287_3: vibbhamantassa sāmaṇerassa ca parivāso na ruhati.
tika-vin05t:1287_10: Sacepi mānattāraho mānattaṃ caranto abbhānāraho vā vibbhamati,
tika-vin05t:1288_0: Sace koci bhikkhu parivasanto ummattako hoti khittacitto vedanāṭṭo,
tika-vin05t:1288_1: ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ca parivāso na ruhati.
tika-vin05t:1288_2: So ce puna anummattako hoti akhittacitto avedanāṭṭo,
tika-vin05t:1290_9: tasmā bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1290_10: Yā desanāgāminiyo vā vuṭṭhānagāminiyo vā āpattiyo bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇā,
tika-vin05t:1290_13: Yā pana bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīhi asādhāraṇā sukkavissaṭṭhiādikā āpattiyo,
tika-vin05t:1290_15: liṅge parivatte tā āpattiyo vuṭṭhitāva honti,
tika-vin05t:1290_16: puna pakatiliṅge uppannepi tāhi āpattīhi tassa anāpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1291_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1292_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1294_0: Tattha sace dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ekato sajjhāyaṃ vā dhammasākacchaṃ vā katvā ekāgāre nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkantānaṃ ekassa itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati,
tika-vin05t:1294_2: So ce paṭibujjhitvā attano vippakāraṃ disvā dukkhī dummano rattibhāgeyeva itarassa āroceyya,
tika-vin05t:1294_9: Samassāsetvā evaṃ vattabbaṃ “tumhehi bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1294_10: atthi pana te kāci sandiṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1294_14: “natthī”ti vatvā so bhikkhu vattabbo “mama saṅgahaṃ karotha,
tika-vin05t:1294_16: Tena bhikkhunā taṃ gahetvā tassā vā sandiṭṭhānaṃ attano vā sandiṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santikaṃ gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1294_18: catūhi pañcahi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ jotikañca kattaradaṇḍakañca gahetvā saṃvidahanaṃ parimocetvā “mayaṃ asukaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ gacchāmā”ti gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1294_21: Bhikkhunupassayaṃ gantvā tā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “asukaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ jānāthā”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1295_8: āsannagāme pana aññā ñātikā honti paṭijagganikā,
tika-vin05t:1295_12: mātikā vā vinayo vā uggahito suggahito,
tika-vin05t:1295_17: Pubbe taṃ nissāya vasantehipi aññassa santike nissayo gahetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1296_0: Yaṃ panassa bhikkhubhāve adhiṭṭhitaṃ ticīvarañca patto ca,
tika-vin05t:1296_4: Yaṃ atirekacīvaraṃ vā atirekapatto vā vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
tika-vin05t:1296_8: Sace paṭiggahaṇato sattame divase liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1296_10: Yaṃ pana bhikkhukāle aññassa bhikkhuno santakaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1297_0: “Telaṃ madhu phāṇitañcāpi sappiṃ, sāmaṃ gahetvā nikkhipeyya;
tika-vin05t:1298_0: Avītivatte sattāhe, sati paccaye paribhuñjantassa āpatti;
tika-vin05t:1300_10: Bhikkhuvihāre pana yaṃ kiñcissā santakaṃ paṭiggahetvā vā appaṭiggahetvā vā ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1300_13: Yaṃ panettha thāvaraṃ tassā santakaṃ senāsanaṃ vā uparopakā vā,
tika-vin05t:1300_16: Terasasu sammutīsu yā bhikkhukāle laddhā sammuti,
tika-vin05t:1300_19: Sace pacchimikāya senāsane gahite liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1301_0: Sace bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāya paṭicchannāya āpattiyā parivasantassa liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1301_6: Sace akusalavipāke parikkhīṇe pakkhamānattakāle punadeva liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_0: Bhikkhuniyā liṅgaparivattanepi vuttanayeneva sabbo vinicchayo veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1302_2: sace bhikkhunikāle āpannā sañcarittāpatti paṭicchannā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1302_10: Atha bhikkhūhi mānatte adinne puna liṅgaṃ parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_12: Atha chārattaṃ mānattaṃ carantassa puna parivattati,
tika-vin05t:1302_14: Ciṇṇamānattassa pana liṅgaparivatte jāte bhikkhunīhi abbhānakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
