tika-vin05t:1302_15: Puna parivatte ca liṅge bhikkhunibhāve ṭhitāyapi yā āpattiyo pubbe paṭippassaddhā,
tika-vin05t:1303_2: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā upajjhāyena hutvā na upasampādetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1303_5: aññasmiṃ asati vattaṃ nikkhipitvā sāvetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1303_15: upajjhaṃ datvā gahitasāmaṇeropi vattabbo “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi,
tika-vin05t:1303_27: saṅgho vo ovādadāyakaṃ jānissatī”ti vā “ahaṃ vinayakammaṃ karomi,
tika-vin05t:1303_29: so vo ovādaṃ dassatī”ti vā vattabbā.
tika-vin05t:1304_0: Yāya āpattiyā saṅghena parivāso dinno hoti,
tika-vin05t:1304_2: aññā vā tādisikā tato vā pāpiṭṭhatarā,
tika-vin05t:1304_7: palibodhatthāya vā pakkosanatthāya vā savacanīyaṃ na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1304_8: Palibodhatthāya hi karonto “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ imasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ savacanīyaṃ karomi,
tika-vin05t:1304_10: yāva na taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1304_12: ehi mayā saddhiṃ vinayadharānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ gacchāhī”ti evaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1304_15: pātimokkhuddesakena vā dhammajjhesakena vā na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1304_16: napi terasasu sammutīsu ekasammutivasenapi issariyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1304_18: ahaṃ taṃ vattukāmo”ti evaṃ pakatattassa okāso na kāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1304_19: vatthunā vā āpattiyā vā na codetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1304_21: bhikkhūhi aññamaññaṃ yojetvā kalaho na kāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1304_22: saṅghattherena hutvā pakatattassa bhikkhuno purato na gantabbaṃ na nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1304_23: dvādasahatthaṃ upacāraṃ muñcitvā ekakeneva gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca,
tika-vin05t:1304_24: yo hoti saṅghassa āsanapariyanto seyyāpariyanto vihārapariyanto,
tika-vin05t:1305_3: Seyyāpariyanto nāma seyyānaṃ pariyanto sabbalāmakaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1305_4: Ayañhi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne seyyaṃ gahetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1305_5: sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā maṅgulagūthabharitā vettalatādivinaddhā lāmakaseyyāvassa dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1305_7: evaṃ vasanaāvāsopi vassaggena attano pattaṭṭhāne tassa na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1305_8: sabbabhikkhūhi vicinitvā gahitāvasesā pana rajohatabhūmi jatukamūsikabharitā paṇṇasālā assa dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1305_9: Sace pakatattā sabbe rukkhamūlikā abbhokāsikā ca honti,
tika-vin05t:1306_0: Vassūpanāyikadivase paccayaṃ ekapasse ṭhatvā vassaggena gaṇhituṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1306_2: nibaddhavassāvāsikaṃ senāsanaṃ gaṇhitu kāmena vattaṃ nikkhipitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1306_4: asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ bhikkhū nimantesi, etha,
tika-vin05t:1306_5: tattha gacchāmā”ti evaṃ saṃvidhāya bhikkhūnaṃ puresamaṇena vā pacchāsamaṇena vā hutvā kulāni na upasaṅkamitabbāni, “bhante,
tika-vin05t:1306_6: asukasmiṃ nāma gāme manussā bhikkhūnaṃ āgamanaṃ icchanti,
tika-vin05t:1306_8: sace tesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kareyyāthā”ti evaṃ panassa vinayapariyāyena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1306_9: Āgatāgatānaṃ ārocetuṃ harāyamānena āraññikadhutaṅgaṃ na samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1306_11: tena dutiyaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1306_13: Tathā bhattaggādīsu āsanapariyante nisajjāya harāyamānena piṇḍapātikadhutaṅgampi na samādātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1306_16: na ca tappaccayā piṇḍapāto nīharāpetabbo “mā maṃ jāniṃsū”ti.
tika-vin05t:1306_17: Nīhaṭabhatto hutvā vihāreyeva nisīditvā bhuñjanto “rattiyo gaṇayissāmi,
tika-vin05t:1306_18: gacchato me bhikkhuṃ disvā anārocentassa ratticchedo siyā”ti iminā kāraṇena piṇḍapāto na nīharāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1306_19: “mā maṃ ekabhikkhupi jānātū”ti ca iminā ajjhāsayena vihāre sāmaṇerehi pacāpetvā bhuñjitumpi na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1306_21: Gilānassa pana navakammaācariyupajjhāyakiccādipasutassa vā vihāreyeva acchituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1307_11: tasmā kañci vihāraṃ gatena āgantukena tattha bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1308_0: Āgantukassapi attano vasanavihāraṃ āgatassa ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā vuttanayeneva ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1308_2: Sace āgantukā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā vā avissamitvā eva vā vihāramajjhena gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1308_7: sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā asakkontassa ratticchedova hoti,
tika-vin05t:1308_9: Yepi antovihāraṃ appavisitvā upacārasīmaṃ okkamitvā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1308_10: ayañca nesaṃ chattasaddaṃ vā ukkāsitasaddaṃ vā khipitasaddaṃ vā sutvā āgantukabhāvaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin05t:1309_0: Nadīādīsu nāvāya gacchantampi paratīre ṭhitampi ākāse gacchantampi pabbatatalaaraññādīsu dūre ṭhitampi
tika-vin05t:1309_2: nāvādīhi gantvā vā mahāsaddaṃ katvā vā vegena anubandhitvā vā ārocetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1309_4: Sace vāyamantopi sampāpuṇituṃ vā sāvetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1309_7: Saṅghasenābhayatthero pana visayāvisayena katheti “visaye kira anārocentassa ratticchedo ceva vattabhede dukkaṭañca hoti,
tika-vin05t:1310_1: iddhiyā gacchantāpi uposathabhāvaṃ ñatvā otaritvā uposathaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1310_4: Gantuṃ asamatthena gilānena bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ārocāpetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1311_0: Na pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sabhikkhukā āvāsā vā anāvāsā vā abhikkhuko nānāsaṃvāsakehi vā sabhikkhuko āvāso
tika-vin05t:1311_1: vā anāvāso vā gantabbo aññatra pakatattena aññatra antarāyā.
tika-vin05t:1311_4: Na hi tattha vuttharattiyo gaṇanūpikā honti.
tika-vin05t:1311_5: Dasavidhe antarāye pana sacepi rattiyo gaṇanūpikā na honti,
tika-vin05t:1311_8: Nānāsaṃvāsakehi saddhiṃ vinayakammaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1312_0: Na pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1312_2: Anāvāso nāma cetiyagharaṃ bodhigharaṃ sammuñjanīaṭṭako dāruaṭṭako pānīyamāḷo vaccakuṭi dvārakoṭṭhakoti evamādi.
tika-vin05t:1312_3: “Etesu yattha katthaci ekacchanne chadanato udakapatanaṭṭhānaparicchinne okāse ukkhittakova vasituṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1312_4: pārivāsiko pana antoāvāseyeva na labhatī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1312_6: Kurundiyaṃ pana “etesu ettakesu pañcavaṇṇacchadanabaddhaṭṭhānesu pārivāsikassa ca ukkhittakassa ca pakatattena saddhiṃ udakapātena vārita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1312_8: Sace panettha tadahupasampannepi pakatatte paṭhamaṃ pavisitvā nipannepi saṭṭhivassikopi pārivāsiko pacchā pavisitvā jānanto nipajjati,
tika-vin05t:1312_12: Sace pana tasmiṃ nisinne pacchā pakatatto pavisitvā nipajjati,
tika-vin05t:1313_0: Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattaṃ bhikkhuṃ tadahupasampannampi disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_1: vuṭṭhāya ca “ahaṃ iminā sukhanisinno vuṭṭhāpito”ti parammukhenapi na gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_3: ettha nisīdathā”ti evaṃ pakatatto bhikkhu āsanena nimantetabboyeva.
tika-vin05t:1313_4: Navakena pana “mahātheraṃ obaddhaṃ karomī”ti pārivāsikattherassa santikaṃ na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1313_5: Pārivāsikena pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekāsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_6: na nīce āsane nisinne ucce āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_8: dvādasahatthaṃ pana upacāraṃ muñcitvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1313_9: Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pakatattena saddhiṃ na ekacaṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_10: na nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_12: Ettha pana akataparicchedāya bhūmiyā caṅkamante paricchedaṃ katvā vālukaṃ ākiritvā ālambanaṃ yojetvā katacaṅkame nīcepi na caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1313_13: ko pana vādo iṭṭhakacayena sampanne vedikāparikkhitte.
tika-vin05t:1314_0: Pārivāsikena bhikkhunā pārivāsikavuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena mānattārahena
tika-vin05t:1314_1: mānattacārikena abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekacchanne āvāse vā anāvāse vā vatthabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1314_2: Ettha pana sace vuḍḍhatare pārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne itaro jānanto pacchā nipajjati,
tika-vin05t:1314_10: Atha navakapārivāsike paṭhamaṃ nipanne vuḍḍhataro pacchā nipajjati,
tika-vin05t:1315_13: Sace hi dve pārivāsikā ekato vaseyyuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1315_14: te aññamaññassa ajjhācāraṃ ñatvā agāravā vā vippaṭisārino vā hutvā taṃ vā āpattiṃ āpajjeyyuṃ tato pāpiṭṭhataraṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1315_17: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahādayo cettha pārivāsikānaṃ pakatattaṭṭhāne ṭhitāti veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1315_18: Tasmā pārivāsikena bhikkhunā mūlāyapaṭikassanārahena mānattārahena mānattacārikena abbhānārahena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ na ekāsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1315_19: na nīce āsane nisinne ucce āsane nisīditabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1315_22: na nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1316_2: pārivāsikena bhikkhunā sāditabbaṃ pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ
tika-vin05t:1316_3: āsanābhihāro seyyābhihāro pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nahāne piṭṭhiparikammaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1316_5: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pakatattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhapetvā navakataraṃ pārivāsikaṃ avasesānaṃ antamaso
tika-vin05t:1316_12: tumhākaṃ vinayakammaṃ karothā”ti vatvā vattaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1317_2: pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mithū yathāvuḍḍhaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ āsanābhihāraṃ
tika-vin05t:1317_3: seyyābhihāraṃ pādodakaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ pādakathalikaṃ pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ nahāne piṭṭhiparikamma”nti
tika-vin05t:1317_4: vacanato pana pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ yo yo vuḍḍho,
tika-vin05t:1317_5: tena tena navakatarassa abhivādanādiṃ sādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1318_2: pārivāsikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañca yathāvuḍḍhaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ oṇojanaṃ bhatta”nti vacanato
tika-vin05t:1318_3: imāni uposathādīni pañca pakatattehipi saddhiṃ vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1318_4: tasmā pātimokkhe uddissamāne hatthapāse nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1318_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “pāḷiyā anisīditvā pāḷiṃ vihāya hatthapāsaṃ amuñcantena nisīditabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1318_6: Pārisuddhiuposathe kariyamāne saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pārisuddhiuposatho kātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1318_7: Pavāraṇāyapi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisīditvā tattheva nisinnena attano pāḷiyā pavāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1318_8: Saṅghena ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājiyamānaṃ vassikasāṭikampi attano pattaṭṭhāne gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1319_1: Sace hi pārivāsikassa dve tīṇi uddesabhattādīni pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin05t:1319_9: Yadi pana na gaṇhāti na vissajjeti,
tika-vin05t:1319_11: Idaṃ oṇojanaṃ nāma pārivāsikasseva odissa anuññātaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:1319_12: Tassa hi saṅghanavakaṭṭhāne nisinnassa bhattagge yāgukhajjakādīni pāpuṇanti vā na vā,
tika-vin05t:1319_13: tasmā “so bhikkhāhārena mā kilamitthā”ti idamassa saṅgahakaraṇatthāya odissa anuññātaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1320_0: Bhattanti āgatāgatehi vuḍḍhapaṭipāṭiyā gahetvā gantabbaṃ vihāre saṅghassa catussālabhattaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1320_2: pāḷiyā pana gantuṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1320_3: tasmā pāḷito osakkitvā hatthapāse ṭhitena hatthaṃ pasāretvā yathā seno nipatitvā gaṇhāti,
tika-vin05t:1320_8: Catussālabhatte pana sace oṇojanaṃ kattukāmo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1320_9: attano atthāya ukkhitte piṇḍe “ajja me bhattaṃ atthi,
tika-vin05t:1321_0: Mūlāyapaṭikassanārahānaṃ mānattārahānaṃ mānattacārikānaṃ abbhānārahānañca idameva vattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1321_4: sahavāso vippavāso anārocanā”ti vacanato yvāyaṃ “pakatattena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekacchanne”tiādinā nayena vutto sahavāso,
tika-vin05t:1321_7: etesu tīsu ekenapi kāraṇena pārivāsikassa bhikkhuno ratticchedo hoti.
tika-vin05t:1322_4: ūne gaṇe caraṇa”nti vacanato imesu catūsu kāraṇesu ekenapi ratticchedo hoti.
tika-vin05t:1322_5: Gaṇoti cettha cattāro vā atirekā vā.
tika-vin05t:1322_6: Tasmā sacepi tīhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ vasati,
tika-vin05t:1326_5: vatthuto vā ñattito vā anussāvanato vā sīmato vā parisato vā.
tika-vin05t:1330_13: Imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1331_2: catuvaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā bhikkhū kammappattā te anāgatā honti,
tika-vin05t:1332_14: Imehi dvādasahi ākārehi parisato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1333_0: Catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin05t:1333_5: Pañcavaggakaraṇe kamme pañca bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin05t:1333_10: Dasavaggakaraṇe kamme dasa bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin05t:1333_15: Vīsativaggakaraṇe kamme vīsati bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā,
tika-vin05t:1335_1: Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1336_1: Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ uposathaṃ pavāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ paccukkaḍḍhanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1337_1: Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ uddharaṇaṃ desanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1338_1: Osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ sammutiṃ dānaṃ niggahaṃ samanubhāsanaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva sattamaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1339_2: apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā chandārahānaṃ chandaṃ āharitvā samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā kattabbakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1339_3: Ñattikammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā kattabbakammaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1339_4: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā ekāya ca anussāvanāyāti
tika-vin05t:1339_6: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ nāma vuttanayeneva samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ekāya ñattiyā tīhi ca anussāvanāhīti
tika-vin05t:1340_4: Ñattidutiyakammaṃ pana apaloketvā kātabbampi akātabbampi atthi.
tika-vin05t:1340_5: Tattha sīmāsammuti sīmāsamūhanaṃ kathinadānaṃ kathinuddhāro kuṭivatthudesanā vihāravatthudesanāti imāni
tika-vin05t:1340_6: chakammāni garukāni apaloketvā kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1340_8: Avasesā terasa sammutiyo senāsanaggāhakamatakacīvaradānādisammutiyo cāti etāni lahukakammāni,
tika-vin05t:1340_15: Sace pana akkharaparihīnaṃ vā padaparihīnaṃ vā duruttapadaṃ vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1340_19: Ñatticatutthakammaṃ ñattiñca tisso ca kammavācāyo sāvetvāva kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1341_1: vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakammanti ettha pana atthi kammaṃ sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1341_10: apasādanīyaṃ dassentassa bhikkhuno bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbaṃ avandiyakammanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin05t:1341_11: Idaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi kammaṃ asammukhā kataṃ sukataṃ hoti akuppaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1341_13: Saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatāti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ sammukhāvinayaṃ upanetvāva kātabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1341_15: evaṃ akatāni panetāni imaṃ sammukhāvinayasaṅkhātaṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā vatthuvipannāni nāma honti.
tika-vin05t:1341_19: taṃ vatthuṃ vinā katattā tesampi vatthuvipannatā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1341_20: Apica ūnavīsativassaṃ vā antimavatthuṃ ajjhāpannapubbaṃ vā ekādasasu vā abhabbapuggalesu aññataraṃ upasampādentassapi
tika-vin05t:1342_0: Ñattito vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuṃ na parāmasatīti yassa upasampadādikammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1342_4: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1343_0: Saṅghaṃ na parāmasatīti saṅghassa nāmaṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-vin05t:1344_0: Puggalaṃ na parāmasatīti yo upasampadāpekkhassa upajjhāyo,
tika-vin05t:1344_4: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1345_0: Ñattiṃ na parāmasatīti sabbena sabbaṃ ñattiṃ na parāmasati,
tika-vin05t:1345_1: ñattidutiyakamme ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā dvikkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1345_2: ñatticatutthakammepi ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā catukkhattuṃ kammavācāya eva anussāvanakammaṃ karoti.
tika-vin05t:1346_0: Pacchā vā ñattiṃ ṭhapetīti paṭhamaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanakammaṃ katvā “esā ñattī”ti vatvā “khamati saṅghassa,
tika-vin05t:1346_4: Iti imehi pañcahākārehi ñattito kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1347_0: Anussāvanato vipattiyaṃ pana vatthuādīni tāva vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1347_6: saṅgho”ti dutiyatatiyānussāvanāsu vā “ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassa upasampadāpekkho”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1347_7: āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vadanto vatthuṃ na parāmasati nāma.
tika-vin05t:1347_10: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito”ti vadanto saṅghaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
tika-vin05t:1347_12: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito āyasmato buddharakkhitassā”ti vattabbe “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho,
tika-vin05t:1347_13: ayaṃ dhammarakkhito upasampadāpekkho”ti vadanto puggalaṃ na parāmasati nāma.
tika-vin05t:1348_0: Sāvanaṃ hāpetīti sabbena sabbaṃ kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ na karoti,
tika-vin05t:1348_4: Yopi ñattidutiyakamme ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā ekaṃ kammavācaṃ anussāvento akkharaṃ vā chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin05t:1348_7: Ñatticatutthakamme pana ekaṃ ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā sakimeva vā dvikkhattuṃ vā kammavācāya anussāvanaṃ karontopi
tika-vin05t:1348_8: akkharaṃ vā padaṃ vā chaḍḍentopi duruttaṃ karontopi anussāvanaṃ hāpetiyevāti veditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1349_2: Yo hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati,
tika-vin05t:1351_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-vin05t:1352_2: Ettha hi sithilaṃ nāma pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1352_7: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa nakkhamatī”ti evaṃ saṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1352_9: yaṃ vā “āyasmato buddharakkhitattherassa yassa na khamatī”ti evaṃ asaṃyogaparaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1352_10: Niggahitanti yaṃ karaṇāni niggahetvā avissajjetvā avivaṭena mukhena sānunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1352_11: Sambandhanti yaṃ parapadena sambandhitvā “tuṇhissā”ti vā “tuṇhassā”ti vā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1352_12: Vavatthitanti yaṃ parapadena asambandhaṃ katvā vicchinditvā “tuṇhī assā”ti vā “tuṇha assā”ti vā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1352_13: Vimuttanti yaṃ karaṇāni aniggahetvā vissajjetvā vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ akatvā vuccati.
tika-vin05t:1353_2: kāraṃ katvā “suṇāthu me”ti vacanaṃ sithilassa dhanitakaraṇaṃ nāma,
tika-vin05t:1353_3: tathā “pattakallaṃ esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “patthakallaṃ esā ñatthī”tiādivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1353_6: kāre katvā “bante saṃgo”ti vacanaṃ dhanitassa sithilakaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:1353_7: “Suṇātu me”ti vivaṭena mukhena vattabbe pana “suṇaṃtu me”ti vā “esā ñattī”ti vattabbe “esaṃ ñattī”ti
tika-vin05t:1353_8: vā avivaṭena mukhena ananunāsikaṃ katvā vacanaṃ vimuttassa niggahitavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:1353_9: “Pattakalla”nti avivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ katvā vattabbe “pattakallā”ti vivaṭena mukhena anunāsikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1353_14: niggahite kattabbe vimuttanti imāni cattāri byañjanāni antokammavācāya kammaṃ dūsenti.
tika-vin05t:1353_15: Evaṃ vadanto hi aññasmiṃ akkhare vattabbe aññaṃ vadati,
tika-vin05t:1354_0: Itaresu pana dīgharassādīsu chasu byañjanesu dīghaṭṭhāne dīghameva,
tika-vin05t:1354_1: rassaṭṭhāne rassamevāti evaṃ yathāṭhāne taṃ tadeva akkharaṃ bhāsantena anukkamāgataṃ paveṇiṃ avināsentena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1354_2: Sace pana evaṃ akatvā dīghe vattabbe rassaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1354_9: Imāni hi cha byañjanāni kammaṃ na kopenti.
tika-vin05t:1354_20: Tasmā vinayadharena neva da- kāro ta-
tika-vin05t:1354_21: kāro kātabbo…pe… na ka- kāro ya- kāro.
tika-vin05t:1354_22: Yathāpāḷiyā niruttiṃ sodhetvā dasavidhāya byañjananiruttiyā vuttadose pariharantena kammavācā kātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1355_0: Akāle vā sāvetīti sāvanāya akāle anokāse ñattiṃ aṭṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃyeva anussāvanakammaṃ katvā pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti.
tika-vin05t:1355_1: Iti imehi pañcahākārehi anussāvanato kammāni vipajjanti.
tika-vin05t:1356_1: Sīmato vipattiyaṃ pana atikhuddakasīmā nāma yā ekavīsati bhikkhū na gaṇhāti.
tika-vin05t:1356_2: Kurundiyaṃ pana “yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkontī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1356_7: Ettha pana atimahatī nāma yā kesaggamattenapi tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1356_9: Puratthimāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā puna
tika-vin05t:1356_10: puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ nimittaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1356_12: Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti,
tika-vin05t:1356_14: Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjaṃ vā vālukapuñjaṃ
tika-vin05t:1356_15: vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1356_16: Chāyānimittā nāma yā pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1356_17: Animittā nāma yā sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā hoti.
tika-vin05t:1356_18: Bahisīme ṭhito sīmaṃ sammannati nāma nimittāni kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahi ṭhito sammannati.
tika-vin05t:1356_19: Nadiyā samudde jātassare sīmaṃ sammannatīti etesu nadīādīsu yaṃ sammannati,
tika-vin05t:1356_24: sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1356_25: Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindati.
tika-vin05t:1356_26: Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharatīti attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ ajjhottharati.
tika-vin05t:1356_27: Tattha yathā sambhedo ca ajjhottharaṇañca hoti,
tika-vin05t:1356_29: Iti imā ekādasapi sīmā asīmā gāmakhettasadisā eva,
tika-vin05t:1356_31: Tena vuttaṃ “imehi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato kammāni vipajjantī”ti.
tika-vin05t:1357_0: Parisato kammavipattiyaṃ pana kiñci anuttānaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:1357_2: tampi parato “cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā”tiādinā nayena vuttameva.
tika-vin05t:1357_3: Tattha pakatattā kammappattāti catuvaggakaraṇe kamme cattāro pakatattā anukkhittā anissāritā parisuddhasīlā
tika-vin05t:1357_4: cattāro bhikkhū kammappattā kammassa arahā anucchavikā sāmino.
tika-vin05t:1357_5: Na tehi vinā taṃ kammaṃ karīyati,
tika-vin05t:1357_6: na tesaṃ chando vā pārisuddhi vā eti,
tika-vin05t:1357_9: chandapārisuddhiṃ datvā āgacchantu vā mā vā,
tika-vin05t:1357_13: apica yasmā taṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ katvā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1358_2: osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇaṃ bhaṇḍukammaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti ettha “osāraṇaṃ nissāraṇa”nti padasiliṭṭhatāyetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1358_5: Tattha yā sā kaṇṭakassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammanāsanā,
tika-vin05t:1358_7: Tasmā etarahi sacepi sāmaṇero buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhaṇati,
tika-vin05t:1358_11: so yāvatatiyaṃ nivāretvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1359_1: pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko,
tika-vin05t:1359_2: yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sahaseyyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1359_5: Tatiyampi bhante saṅghaṃ pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero…pe…
tika-vin05t:1360_2: svāhaṃ saṅghaṃ khamāpemī”ti khamāpento yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā apalokanakammeneva osāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1360_4: Saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1361_1: pucchāmi ‘ayaṃ itthannāmo sāmaṇero buddhassa dhammassa saṅghassa avaṇṇavādī micchādiṭṭhiko,
tika-vin05t:1361_2: yaṃ aññe sāmaṇerā labhanti dirattatirattaṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sahaseyyaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1361_4: svāyaṃ idāni sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito katadaṇḍakammo accayaṃ deseti,
tika-vin05t:1361_5: imassa sāmaṇerassa yathā pure kāyasambhogasāmaggidānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
tika-vin05t:1363_0: Brahmadaṇḍo pana na kevalaṃ channasseva paññatto,
tika-vin05t:1363_2: bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento vambhento viharati,
tika-vin05t:1363_5: Saṅghamajjhe byattena bhikkhunā saṅghassa anumatiyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1364_2: bhikkhū duruttavacanehi ghaṭṭento khuṃsento vambhento viharati,
tika-vin05t:1364_6: na ovaditabbo na anusāsitabbo, saṅghaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1364_7: pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā’ti.
tika-vin05t:1364_9: tatiyampi pucchāmi ‘itthannāmassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa dānaṃ ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
tika-vin05t:1365_0: Tassa aparena samayena sammā vattitvā khamāpentassa brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1366_2: so bhikkhu sorato nivātavutti lajjidhammaṃ okkanto hirottappe patiṭṭhito paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare tiṭṭhati, saṅghaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1366_3: pucchāmi ‘tassa bhikkhuno brahmadaṇḍassa paṭippassaddhi ruccati saṅghassā”’ti.
tika-vin05t:1367_0: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ vatvā apalokanakammeneva brahmadaṇḍo paṭippassambhetabboti.
tika-vin05t:1368_0: Kammalakkhaṇaññeva pañcamanti yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunikkhandhake –
tika-vin05t:1369_0: “Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo kaddamodakena osiñcanti ‘appeva nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu’nti,
tika-vin05t:1369_5: bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ sampayojenti ‘appeva nāma amhesu sārajjeyyu”’nti –
tika-vin05t:1370_0: Imesu vatthūsu yesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dukkaṭaṃ paññapetvā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin05t:1370_2: tassa bhikkhuno daṇḍakammaṃ kātu”nti vatvā “kiṃ nu kho daṇḍakammaṃ kātabba”nti saṃsaye uppanne “avandiyo so,
tika-vin05t:1370_4: bhikkhu bhikkhunisaṅghena kātabbo”ti evaṃ avandiyakammaṃ anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1370_10: Tassa karaṇaṃ paṭippassaddhiyā saddhiṃ vitthārato dassayissāma.
tika-vin05t:1370_11: Bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1371_1: asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin05t:1371_2: etassa ayyassa avandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatī”ti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmi. ‘Ayye,
tika-vin05t:1371_3: asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin05t:1372_0: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammena avandiyakammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1373_0: Tato paṭṭhāya so bhikkhu bhikkhunīhi na vanditabbo.
tika-vin05t:1373_1: Sace avandiyamāno hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā sammā vattati,
tika-vin05t:1373_3: Khamāpentana bhikkhunupassayaṃ agantvā vihāreyeva saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1373_7: Tena saṅghena vā gaṇena vā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesetvā ekabhikkhunā vā sayameva gantvā bhikkhuniyo vattabbā “ayaṃ bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito,
tika-vin05t:1373_12: Bhikkhunupassaye sannipatitassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa anumatiyā byattāya bhikkhuniyā sāvetabbaṃ –
tika-vin05t:1374_1: asuko nāma ayyo bhikkhunīnaṃ apāsādikaṃ dassetīti bhikkhunisaṅghena avandiyo kato,
tika-vin05t:1374_2: so lajjidhammaṃ okkamitvā paṭisaṅkhā āyatiṃ saṃvare ṭhito,
tika-vin05t:1374_4: tassa ayyassa vandiyakaraṇaṃ ruccatīti bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1375_0: Tikkhattuṃ vattabbaṃ. Evaṃ apalokanakammeneva vandiyo kātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1376_4: Yañhi bhikkhusaṅgho salākabhattauposathaggesu ca apalokanakammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1376_6: Acchinnacīvarajiṇṇacīvaranaṭṭhacīvarānañhi saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā byattena bhikkhunā yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvā cīvaraṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1376_7: Appamattakavissajjakena pana cīvaraṃ karontassa paccayabhājanīyakathāyaṃ vuttappabhedāni sūciādīni anapaloketvāpi dātabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1376_13: Yopi ca dubbalo vā chinniriyāpatho vā pacchinnabhikkhācārapatho vā mahāgilāno,
tika-vin05t:1376_14: tassa mahāvāsesu tatruppādato devasikaṃ nāḷi vā upaḍḍhanāḷi vā,
tika-vin05t:1376_15: ekadivasaṃyeva vā pañca vā dasa vā taṇḍulanāḷiyo dentena apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbā.
tika-vin05t:1376_16: Pesalassa bhikkhuno tatruppādato iṇapalibodhampi bahussutassa saṅghabhāranittharakassa bhikkhuno anuṭṭhāpanīyasenāsanampi
tika-vin05t:1376_17: saṅghakiccaṃ karontānaṃ kappiyakārakādīnaṃ bhattavetanampi apalokanakammena dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1377_0: Catupaccayavasena dinnatatruppādato saṅghikaṃ āvāsaṃ jaggāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1377_1: “ayaṃ bhikkhu issaravatāya vicāretī”ti kathāpacchindanatthaṃ pana salākaggādīsu vā antarasannipāte vā saṅghaṃ āpucchitvāva jaggāpetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1377_2: Cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya odissa dinnatatruppādatopi apaloketvā āvāso jaggāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1377_4: “sūro vatāyaṃ bhikkhu cīvarapiṇḍapātatthāya odissa dinnato āvāsaṃ jaggāpetī”ti evaṃ uppannakathāpacchedanatthaṃ
tika-vin05t:1378_0: Cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā bodhigharaṃ vā āsanagharaṃ vā akataṃ vā karontena jiṇṇaṃ vā paṭisaṅkharontena
tika-vin05t:1378_1: sudhākammaṃ vā karontena manusse samādapetvā kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1378_4: Upanikkhepepi asati apalokanakammaṃ katvā tatruppādato kāretabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1378_6: Cetiyassa santakena apaloketvāpi saṅghikakiccaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1378_7: tāvakālikaṃ pana gahetvā paṭipākatikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1378_8: Cetiye sudhākammādīni karontehi pana bhikkhācārato vā saṅghato vā yāpanamattaṃ alabhantehi cetiyasantakato
tika-vin05t:1378_9: yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā paribhuñjantehi vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1378_10: “vattaṃ karomā”ti macchamaṃsādīhi saṅghabhattaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1379_0: Ye vihāre ropitā phalarukkhā saṅghena pariggahitā honti,
tika-vin05t:1379_2: Yesaṃ phalāni ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin05t:1380_1: yaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre antosīmāya saṅghasantakaṃ mūlatacapattaaṅkurapupphaphalakhādanīyādi atthi,
tika-vin05t:1380_2: taṃ sabbaṃ āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ruccatīti saṅghaṃ pucchāmī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1382_1: Yasmimpi vihāre dve tayo janā vasanti,
tika-vin05t:1382_4: tena bhikkhunā uposathadivase pubbakaraṇapubbakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena katampi katikavattaṃ saṅghena katasadisameva hoti.
tika-vin05t:1382_5: Karontena pana phalavārena kātumpi cattāro māse cha māse ekasaṃvaccharanti evaṃ paricchinditvāpi aparicchinditvāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1382_9: Yepi tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ bījehi aññe rukkhā ropitā honti,
tika-vin05t:1383_0: Sace pana aññasmiṃ vihāre ropitā honti,
tika-vin05t:1383_3: Yepi aññato bījāni āharitvā purimavihāre pacchā ropitā,
tika-vin05t:1383_7: Sace panettha taṃ taṃ okāsaṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇāni katvā jagganti,
tika-vin05t:1383_10: Tehi pana saṅghassa dasamabhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1383_11: Yopi majjhevihāre rukkhaṃ sākhāhi parivāretvā rakkhati,
tika-vin05t:1384_0: Porāṇakavihāraṃ gatassa sambhāvanīyabhikkhuno “thero āgato”ti phalāphalaṃ āharanti,
tika-vin05t:1384_1: sace tattha mūle sabbapariyattidharo bahussutabhikkhu vihāsi,
tika-vin05t:1384_2: “addhā ettha dīghā katikā katā bhavissatī”ti nikkukkuccena paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1384_5: Sāmaṇerā attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ bahūni phalāni denti,
tika-vin05t:1384_9: ekaṃ panasarukkhaṃ nissāya saṭṭhipi janā jīvanti,
tika-vin05t:1384_10: tādise kāle sabbesaṃ saṅgahakaraṇatthāya bhājetvā khāditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1384_15: Yadā samaggo saṅgho sannipatitvā “ito paṭṭhāya bhājetvā khādantū”ti sāvebhi,
tika-vin05t:1384_16: ekabhikkhuke pana vihāre etena sāvitepi purimakatikā paṭippassambhatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1384_17: Sace paṭippassaddhāya katikāya sāmaṇerā neva rukkhato pātenti,
tika-vin05t:1384_20: tesaṃ dasamabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva upaḍḍhaphalabhāgena phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1384_22: puna subhikkhe jāte kappiyakārakesu āgantvā sākhāparivārādīni katvā rukkhe rakkhantesu sāmaṇerānaṃ phātikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1385_0: “Vihāre phalāphalaṃ atthī”ti sāmantagāmehi manussā gilānānaṃ vā gabbhinīnaṃ vā atthāya āgantvā “ekaṃ nāḷikeraṃ detha,
tika-vin05t:1385_5: Dentena pana saṅghaṃ sannipātetvā yāvatatiyaṃ sāvetvā apalokanakammaṃ katvāva dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1386_0: “Sāmantagāmehi manussā āgantvā gilānādīnaṃ atthāya phalāphalaṃ yācanti,
tika-vin05t:1386_1: dve nāḷikerāni dve tālaphalāni dve panasāni pañca ambāni pañca kadaliphalāni gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1386_2: asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ ruccati bhikkhusaṅghassā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1387_1: Tato paṭṭhāya gilānādīnaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā yācantā “gaṇhathā”ti na vattabbā,
tika-vin05t:1387_2: vattaṃ pana ācikkhitabbaṃ “nāḷikerādīni iminā nāma paricchedena gaṇhantānaṃ asukarukkhato ca asukarukkhato ca phalaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ anivāraṇaṃ kata”nti.
tika-vin05t:1388_0: Phalabhājanakāle pana āgatānaṃ sammatena upaḍḍhabhāgo dātabbo,
tika-vin05t:1388_2: Khīṇaparibbayo vā maggagamiyasatthavāho vā añño vā issaro āgantvā yācati,
tika-vin05t:1388_7: Puggalikapariveṇaṃ āgantvā gilānassa nāmena yācanto “amhehi chāyādīnaṃ atthāya ropitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1389_4: Athāpi kassaci paṭibalassa bhikkhuno “imaṃ sappurisa jaggitvā dehī”ti saṅgho bhāraṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1389_7: Phātikammaṃ paccāsīsantassa pana tatiyabhāgena vā upaḍḍhabhāgena vā phātikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1389_8: “Bhāriyaṃ kamma”nti vatvā ettakena anicchanto pana “sabbaṃ taveva santakaṃ katvā mūlabhāgaṃ dasamabhāgamattaṃ datvā jaggāhī”tipi vattabbo,
tika-vin05t:1389_10: So mūlabhāgaṃ datvā khādanto akatāvāsaṃ vā katvā katāvāsaṃ vā jaggitvā nissitakānaṃ ārāmaṃ niyyāteti,
tika-vin05t:1390_0: Yadā pana bhikkhū sayaṃ jaggituṃ pahonti,
tika-vin05t:1390_7: Sace pana neva vattasīsena jagganto atthi,
tika-vin05t:1390_10: eko anāpucchitvāva jaggitvā phātikammaṃ vaḍḍhetvā paccāsīsati,
tika-vin05t:1394_4: so atthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ paṭibāhati,
tika-vin05t:1394_6: itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuṃ vuṭṭhāpetvā avasesā imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasameyyāmā”ti –
tika-vin05t:1395_0: Evaṃ ubbāhikavinicchaye dhammakathikassa bhikkhuno nissāraṇā nissāraṇā nāma.
tika-vin05t:1397_0: Evaṃ uposathakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti uposatho nāma.
tika-vin05t:1399_0: Evaṃ pavāraṇakammavasena ṭhapitā ñatti pavāraṇā nāma.
tika-vin05t:1401_0: Evaṃ attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā sammannituṃ ṭhapitā ñatti sammuti nāma.
tika-vin05t:1402_1: idaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1402_3: saṅgho imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti,
tika-vin05t:1402_5: āyasmantā imaṃ cīvaraṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyu”nti –
tika-vin05t:1404_1: ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu āpattiṃ sarati vivarati uttāniṃ karoti deseti,
tika-vin05t:1407_2: bhikkhū bhaṇḍanakārakā kalahakārakā vivādakārakā bhassakārakā saṅghe adhikaraṇakārakā taṃ kāḷaṃ anuvaseyyuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1407_3: āvāsikena bhikkhunā byattena paṭibalena āvāsikā bhikkhū ñāpetabbā –
tika-vin05t:1410_0: Sabbeheva ekajjhaṃ sannipatitabbaṃ, sannipatitvā byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:1411_1: amhākaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ viharataṃ bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhāciṇṇaṃ bhāsitaparikkantaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1411_2: sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma,
tika-vin05t:1411_3: siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvatteyya,
tika-vin05t:1411_5: saṅgho imaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tiṇavatthārakena vūpasameyya ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ ṭhapetvā gihippaṭisaṃyutta”nti –
tika-vin05t:1412_0: Evaṃ tiṇavatthārakasamathena katvā sabbapaṭhamā sabbasaṅgāhikañatti kammalakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin05t:1413_0: Tathā tato parā ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekaṃ katvā dve ñattiyo.
tika-vin05t:1413_2: kammalakkhaṇaññeva navamanti ñattikammaṃ imāni nava ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1414_1: Ñattidutiyakammaṭṭhānabhede pana vaḍḍhassa licchavino pattanikkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā nissāraṇā,
tika-vin05t:1414_2: tasseva pattukkujjanavasena khandhake vuttā osāraṇā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1415_13: imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṃ nikkujjituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1416_0: Evañca pana bhikkhave nikkujjitabbo. Byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena saṅgho ñāpetabbo –
tika-vin05t:1417_1: vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti,
tika-vin05t:1418_1: vaḍḍho licchavī āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃseti,
tika-vin05t:1418_4: yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa nikkujjanā asambhogaṃ saṅghena karaṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1419_0: “Nikkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto asambhogo saṅghena,
tika-vin05t:1420_8: imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa upāsakassa pattaṃ ukkujjituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1421_4: vaḍḍhena licchavinā saṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ
tika-vin05t:1426_9: yassāyasmato khamati vaḍḍhassa licchavissa pattassa ukkujjanā sambhogaṃ saṅghena karaṇaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1427_0: “Ukkujjito saṅghena vaḍḍhassa licchavissa patto sambhogo saṅghena,
tika-vin05t:1428_0: Ettha ca aṭṭhasu aṅgesu ekakenapi aṅgena samannāgatassa pattanikkujjanakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1428_1: antosīmāya vā nissīmaṃ gantvā nadīādīsu vā nikkujjituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1428_2: Evaṃ nikkujjite pana patte tassa gehe koci deyyadhammo na gahetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1428_3: “asukassa gehe bhikkhaṃ mā gaṇhitthā”ti aññavihāresupi pesetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1428_4: Ukkujjanakāle pana yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā hatthapāsaṃ vijahāpetvā ñattidutiyakammena ukkujjitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1429_8: Yā pana tiṇavatthārakasamathe sabbasaṅgāhikañattiñca ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekañattiñcāti tisso ñattiyo ṭhapetvā
tika-vin05t:1429_9: puna ekekasmiṃ pakkhe ekekāti dve ñattidutiyakammavācā vuttā,
tika-vin05t:1429_11: Iti ñattidutiyakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1430_1: Ñatticatutthakammaṭṭhānabhede pana tajjanīyakammādīnaṃ sattannaṃ kammānaṃ vasena nissāraṇā,
tika-vin05t:1430_2: tesaṃyeva ca kammānaṃ paṭippassambhanavasena osāraṇā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1430_8: caṇḍakāḷī ca imete yāvatatiyakāti imāsaṃ ekādasannaṃ samanubhāsanānaṃ vasena samanubhāsanā veditabbā.
tika-vin05t:1430_10: Iti ñatticatutthakammaṃ imāni satta ṭhānāni gacchati.
tika-vin05t:1430_11: Evaṃ kammāni ca kammavipatti ca tesaṃ kammānaṃ kārakasaṅghaparicchedo ca vipattivirahitānaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānabhedagamanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1452_2: “Gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ gaṇabhojanaṃ dvīhi ākārehi pasavati viññattito vā nimantanato vā.
tika-vin05t:1452_4: Cattāro bhikkhū ekato ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā upāsakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ catunnampi bhattaṃ dehī”ti vā viññāpeyyuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1452_6: mayhaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ ekato vā nānāto vā viññāpetvā ekato vā gacchantu nānāto vā,
tika-vin05t:1452_7: bhattaṃ gahetvāpi ekato vā bhuñjantu nānāto vā.
tika-vin05t:1453_3: odanaṃ me gaṇhatha ākaṅkhatha oloketha adhivāsetha paṭimānethā”ti evaṃ yena kenaci vevacanena vā bhāsantarena
tika-vin05t:1453_4: vā pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā nimanteti.
tika-vin05t:1453_5: Evaṃ ekato nimantitā paricchinnakālavasena ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā ekato gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1453_10: Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1453_14: Ekato nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1453_16: ekato vā nānāto vā bhuñjanti, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1453_17: Cattāri pariveṇāni vā vihāre vā gantvā nānāto nimantitā,
tika-vin05t:1453_18: ekaṭṭhāne ṭhitesuyeva vā eko puttena eko pitarāti evampi nānāto nimantitā ekato vā nānāto vā gacchantu,
tika-vin05t:1454_0: Tasmā sace koci saṅghabhattaṃ kattukāmena nimantanatthāya pesito vihāraṃ āgamma “bhante,
tika-vin05t:1454_1: sve amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti avatvā “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅghabhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vā “saṅgho bhattaṃ gaṇhatū”ti vā vadati,
tika-vin05t:1454_5: Evaṃ tāva vattabbaṃ “sve na sakkā upāsakā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1454_8: Evaṃ yāva aḍḍhamāsampi haritvā puna vattabbo “kiṃ tvaṃ avacā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1454_10: tato “imaṃ tāva upāsaka pupphaṃ kappiyaṃ karohi,
tika-vin05t:1454_11: imaṃ tiṇa”nti evaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā puna “tvaṃ kiṃ kathayitthā”ti pucchitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1454_13: tvaṃ piṇḍapātike vā mahallakatthere vā na lacchasi,
tika-vin05t:1454_16: ahaṃ kasmā na labhāmī”ti ca vutte te nimantituṃ jānanti,
tika-vin05t:1455_2: bahū bhikkhū lacchasi, tayo eva, āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1455_4: amukasmiñca amukasmiñca gāme sakalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhojesuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1455_10: Sace sopi tatheva “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadati, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1455_18: bhante”ti vatvā āgataṃ pucchanti “kiṃ bho laddhā bhikkhū”ti?
tika-vin05t:1455_23: Dutiyadivase cetiyavattaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhū saṅghattherena vattabbā “āvuso,
tika-vin05t:1455_30: tesu pattāni gahetvā nisīdāpetvā bhojentesu bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1456_0: Sace āsanasālāya bhattaṃ ṭhapetvā rathikāsu āhiṇḍantā ārocenti “āsanasālāyaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1456_3: Atha pana “bhattaṃ ādāya tattha tattha gantvā bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:1456_4: paṭikacceva vā vihāraṃ atiharitvā patirūpe ṭhāne ṭhapetvā āgatāgatānaṃ denti,
tika-vin05t:1456_6: Sace pana bhattasālāya dānaṃ sajjetvā taṃ taṃ pariveṇaṃ pahiṇanti “bhattasālāya bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1456_7: Ye pana manussā piṇḍacārike bhikkhū disvā āsanasālaṃ sammajjitvā tattha nisīdāpetvā bhojenti,
tika-vin05t:1456_9: Ye pana gāme bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamante bhikkhū disvā “bhante,
tika-vin05t:1456_19: gehe ca gāme ca bhattaṃ nāma yassa kassaci hoti,
tika-vin05t:1456_23: Āsanasālāto piṇḍāya carituṃ nikkhamante disvā “nisīdatha, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1457_0: “Aññatra samayā”ti vacanato gilānasamayo cīvaradānasamayo cīvarakārasamayo addhānagamanasamayo nāvābhiruhanasamayo
tika-vin05t:1457_1: mahāsamayo samaṇabhattasamayoti etesu sattasu samayesu aññatarasmiṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1457_2: Tasmā yathā mahācammassa parato maṃsaṃ dissati,
tika-vin05t:1457_4: vālikāya vā sakkharāya vā pahaṭamatte dukkhaṃ uppādenti,
tika-vin05t:1457_5: na sakkā ca hoti antogāme piṇḍāya carituṃ,
tika-vin05t:1458_0: Cīvaradānasamayo nāma anatthate kathine vassānassa pacchimo māso,
tika-vin05t:1458_4: Yadā hi sāṭakañca suttañca labhitvā cīvaraṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1458_7: tasmā yo tattha cīvare kattabbaṃ yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1458_10: Kurundiyaṃ pana vitthāreneva vuttaṃ “yo cīvaraṃ vicāreti chindati,
tika-vin05t:1458_21: Yo pana samīpe nisinno jātakaṃ vā dhammapadaṃ vā katheti,
tika-vin05t:1459_0: Addhānagamanasamaye antamaso aḍḍhayojanaṃ gantukāmenapi “aḍḍhayojanaṃ gacchissāmī”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1460_1: āruḷhena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvāpi yāva na orohati,
tika-vin05t:1461_0: Mahāsamayo nāma yattha dve tayo bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā yāpenti,
tika-vin05t:1461_3: Yattha pana sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā sannipatanti,
tika-vin05t:1462_0: Samaṇabhattasamayo nāma yo koci paribbājakasamāpanno bhattaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1462_2: Tasmā sahadhammikesu vā titthiyesu vā aññatarena yena kenaci kate bhatte “samaṇabhattasamayo”ti bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1462_11: pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti vacanato yepi akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā dve vā tayo vā ekato gahetvā bhuñjanti,
tika-vin05t:1463_0: Tattha animantitacatutthaṃ piṇḍapātikacatutthaṃ anupasampannacatutthaṃ pattacatutthaṃ gilānacatutthanti
tika-vin05t:1463_1: pañcannaṃ catutthānaṃ vasena vinicchayo veditabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin05t:1463_9: bhante”ti gharaṃ pavesetvā catunnampi bhattaṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1463_12: Tayo eva hi tattha nimantitā gaṇhiṃsu,
tika-vin05t:1464_2: gamanavelāyaṃ pana “ehi bhante”ti vutte anadhivāsitattā anāgacchantampi “etha bhikkhaṃ lacchathā”ti gahetvā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1465_0: Anupasampannacatutthe sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ nimantitā honti, sopi gaṇaṃ bhindati.
tika-vin05t:1466_0: Pattacatutthe eko sayaṃ āgantvā pattaṃ peseti, evampi gaṇo bhijjati, tasmā sabbesaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1467_5: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana avisesena vuttaṃ “samayaladdhako sayameva muccati,
tika-vin05t:1468_0: Sace pana adhivāsetvā gatesupi catūsu janesu eko paṇḍito bhikkhu “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇaṃ bhindissāmi,
tika-vin05t:1468_1: nimantanaṃ sādiyathā”ti vatvā yāgukhajjakāvasāne bhattatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ adatvā “ime tāva bhikkhū bhojetvā vissajjetha,
tika-vin05t:1468_2: ahaṃ pacchā anumodanaṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti nisinno,
tika-vin05t:1468_4: patta”nti upāsakena pattaṃ gahetvā bhatte dinne bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ katvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:1468_6: Pañcannañhi bhojanānaṃyeva vasena gaṇabhojane visaṅketaṃ natthi,
tika-vin05t:1468_8: tāni ca tehi ekato na gahitāni,
tika-vin05t:1468_10: tāni tehi ekato gahitānīti evaṃ eko paṇḍito aññesampi anāpattiṃ karoti.
tika-vin05t:1469_1: “Paramparabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiya”nti vuttaṃ paramparabhojanaṃ pana nimantanatoyeva pasavati.
tika-vin05t:1469_2: Yo hi “pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā nimantito taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ
tika-vin05t:1469_5: Evaṃ bhuñjantassa ṭhapetvā gilānasamayaṃ cīvaradānasamayaṃ cīvarakārasamayañca aññasmiṃ samaye pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1470_2: vikappetvā paramparabhojanaṃ bhuñjitu”nti vacanato paṭhamanimantanaṃ aññassa vikappetvāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1470_3: Ayaṃ vikappanā nāma sammukhāpi parammukhāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1470_4: Sammukhā disvā “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ tuyhaṃ vikappemī”ti vā “dammī”ti vā vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1470_5: adisvā pañcasu sahadhammikesu yassa kassaci nāmaṃ gahetvā “mayhaṃ bhattapaccāsaṃ itthannāmassa vikappemī”ti vā “dammī”ti vā vatvā bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1470_6: Dve tīṇi nimantanāni pana ekasmiṃ patte pakkhipitvā missetvā ekaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1470_7: “Anāpatti dve tayo nimantane ekato bhuñjatī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1470_8: Sace dve tīṇi kulāni nimantetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīdāpetvā ito cito ca āharitvā bhattaṃ ākiranti,
tika-vin05t:1471_3: hatthaṃ pana anto pavesetvā paṭhamanimantanato ekampi kabaḷaṃ uddharitvā bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya yathā tathā vā bhuñjantassa anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1471_4: “Sacepi tattha khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā ākiranti,
tika-vin05t:1471_6: koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjantassa anāpattī”ti mahāpaccariyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1471_7: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā labhitvā nisinnassa tattheva aññepi khīrabhattaṃ vā rasabhattaṃ vā ākiranti,
tika-vin05t:1471_8: khīraṃ vā rasaṃ vā pivato anāpatti,
tika-vin05t:1471_9: bhuñjantena paṭhamaṃ laddhamaṃsakhaṇḍaṃ vā bhattapiṇḍaṃ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā koṭito paṭṭhāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1472_1: tassa kulaṃ upagatassa upāsakopi tassa puttadārabhātubhaginiādayopi attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ āharitvā patte pakkhipanti,
tika-vin05t:1472_2: “upāsakena paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ abhuñjitvā pacchā laddhaṃ bhuñjantassa āpattī”ti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1472_6: tattha pacchā āhaṭaṃ paṭhamaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1472_7: Yadi pana sabbesaṃ ekova pāko hoti,
tika-vin05t:1472_16: “Aññena āharitvā bhatte dinne āpucchitvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1473_0: Anumodanaṃ katvā gacchantaṃ dhammaṃ sotukāmā “svepi, bhante,
tika-vin05t:1473_2: punadivase āgantvā laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kasmā?
tika-vin05t:1473_4: Ekopi bhikkhu piṇḍāya caranto bhattaṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1473_7: sace so bhikkhu piṇḍāya caritvā laddhabhattaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti.
tika-vin05t:1473_9: na bhuñjasī”ti vutte “tayā nimantitattā”ti vatvā “laddhaṃ laddhaṃ bhuñjatha,
tika-vin05t:1473_11: Sakalena gāmena ekato hutvā nimantitassa yattha katthaci bhuñjato anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1473_13: “Anāpatti sakalena gāmena nimantito tasmiṃ gāme yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
tika-vin05t:1473_14: sakalena pūgena nimantito tasmiṃ pūge yattha katthaci bhuñjati,
tika-vin05t:1473_16: niccabhatte salākabhatte pakkhike uposathike pāṭipadike pañca bhojanāni ṭhapetvā sabbattha anāpattī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1474_0: Tattha nimantiyamāno bhikkhaṃ gahessāmīti bhaṇatīti ettha “bhattaṃ gaṇhā”ti nimantiyamāno “na mayhaṃ tava bhattenattho,
tika-vin05t:1474_3: Ettha pana mahāpadumatthero āha “evaṃ vadanto imasmiṃ sikkhāpade animantanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin05t:1474_4: bhuñjanatthāya pana okāso kato hotīti neva gaṇabhojanato,
tika-vin05t:1476_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ vā pacchābhattaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1476_1: kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1477_1: Iminā hi sikkhāpadena yo pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena “bhattaṃ gaṇhathā”tiādinā akappiyanimantanena nimantito,
tika-vin05t:1477_2: teneva nimantanabhattena sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ “ahaṃ itthannāmassa gharaṃ gacchāmī”ti vā “cārittaṃ
tika-vin05t:1477_3: āpajjāmī”ti vā īdisena vacanena anāpucchitvā yena bhattena nimantito,
tika-vin05t:1477_4: taṃ bhutvā vā abhutvā vā avītivatteyeva majjhanhike yasmiṃ kule nimantito,
tika-vin05t:1477_6: tassa vuttalakkhaṇaṃ duvidhampi samayaṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1477_7: Tasmā akappiyanimantanena nimantiyamāno sace “bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vadati,
tika-vin05t:1478_1: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāti ettha pana kittāvatā santo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1478_3: Antovihāre yattha ṭhitassa kulāni payirupāsanacittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1478_4: tato paṭṭhāya yaṃ passe vā abhimukhe vā passati,
tika-vin05t:1478_7: ito cito ca pariyesitvā ārocanakiccaṃ pana natthi.
tika-vin05t:1478_14: asantaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā paviṭṭho nāma hoti.
tika-vin05t:1479_0: Sace pana sambahulā kenaci kammena gāmaṃ pavisanti,
tika-vin05t:1479_2: Tasmiṃ gāme taṃ kammaṃ na sampajjatīti aññaṃ gāmaṃ gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1479_5: Sace pana ussāhaṃ paṭippassambhetvā vihāraṃ gacchantā antarā aññaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitukāmā honti,
tika-vin05t:1479_7: Kulaghare vā āsanasālāya vā bhattakiccaṃ katvā telabhikkhāya vā sappibhikkhāya vā caritukāmo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1479_15: tena gacchantassa “telādibhikkhāya carissāmī”ti citte uppanne sace passe bhikkhu atthi,
tika-vin05t:1479_17: Maggā anokkamma bhikkhāya carantassa pana āpucchanakiccaṃ natthi.
tika-vin05t:1479_18: Sace sīho vā byaggho vā āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:1479_21: evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpucchāpi bahigāmato antogāmaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1480_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato abbhuṇhe allasarīre paṃsukūlaṃ na gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1481_1: Kākakulalasoṇasiṅgālādīhi mukhatuṇḍakena vā dāṭhāya vā īsakaṃ phālitamattenapi.
tika-vin05t:1481_2: Yassa pana patato ghaṃsanena chavimattaṃ chinnaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1481_6: Yassapi sajīvakāleyeva pabhinnā gaṇḍakuṭṭhapīḷakā vā vaṇo vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1481_8: tatiyadivasato pabhuti uddhumātakādibhāvena kuṇapabhāvaṃ upagatampi bhinnameva.
tika-vin05t:1481_9: Sabbena sabbaṃ pana abhinnepi susānagopakehi vā aññehi vā manussehi gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1481_11: satthakena vā kenaci vā vaṇaṃ katvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1481_12: Visabhāgasarīre pana satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā samaṇasaññaṃ uppādetvā sīse vā hatthapādapiṭṭhiyaṃ vā vaṇaṃ katvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1482_4: acchinnacīvarassa vā naṭṭhacīvarassa vā aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpetuṃ.
tika-vin05t:1482_6: sace tattha hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā bhisicchavi vā,
tika-vin05t:1482_8: No ce hoti saṅghassa vihāracīvaraṃ vā uttarattharaṇaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā bhisicchavi vā,
tika-vin05t:1482_9: tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1482_12: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato idha vuttanayena paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1483_1: Sace hi core passitvā daharā pattacīvarāni gahetvā palātā,
tika-vin05t:1483_5: Atha daharā sabbaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā,
tika-vin05t:1483_6: corā therānañca nivāsanapārupanaṃ tañca bhaṇḍakaṃ haritvā gacchanti,
tika-vin05t:1483_7: daharehi āgantvā attano nivāsanapārupanāni na tāva therānaṃ dātabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1483_8: Na hi te anacchinnacīvarā attano atthāya sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjituṃ labhanti,
tika-vin05t:1483_11: tasmā therehi vā sākhāpalāsaṃ bhañjitvā vākādīhi ganthetvā daharānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1483_12: daharehi vā therānaṃ atthāya bhañjitvā ganthetvā tesaṃ hatthe datvā vā adatvā vā attanā nivāsetvā attano nivāsanapārupanāni therānaṃ dātabbāni,
tika-vin05t:1484_3: Yāni ca nesaṃ te vā viññattamanussā aññe vā sākhāpalāsanivāsane bhikkhū disvā ussāhajātā vatthāni denti,
tika-vin05t:1484_4: tāni sadasāni vā hontu adasāni vā nīlādinānāvaṇṇāni vā,
tika-vin05t:1484_5: kappiyānipi akappiyānipi sabbānipi acchinnacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitattā tesaṃ nivāsetuñca pārupituñca vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1492_2: taṃ anāpucchāpi gahetvā nivāsetuṃ vā pārupituṃ vā labhati.
tika-vin05t:1492_6: Labhitvā ca pana ñātito vā upaṭṭhākato vā aññato vā kutoci pākatikameva kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1492_7: Videsagatena pana ekasmiṃ saṅghike āvāse saṅghikaparibhogena bhuñjanatthāya ṭhapetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1492_8: Sacassa paribhogeneva taṃ jīrati vā nassati vā,
tika-vin05t:1492_10: Sace pana etesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ gihivatthādīnaṃ bhisicchavipariyantānaṃ kiñci na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1492_11: tena tiṇena vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādetvā āgantabbanti.
tika-vin05t:1493_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato itthipurisarūpaṃ kātuṃ vā kārāpetuṃ vā bhikkhuno na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1493_6: tiracchānarūpampi antamaso gaṇḍuppādarūpaṃ bhikkhuno sayaṃ kātuṃ vā “karohī”ti vattuṃ vā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1493_8: Jātakapakaraṇaasadisadānādīni pana pasādanīyāni nibbidāpaṭisaṃyuttāni vā vatthūni parehi kārāpetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1494_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato antaraghare vā vihāre vā araññe vā yattha katthaci bhuñjamāno bhikkhu aniṭṭhite bhojane na vuṭṭhāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1494_5: antaraghare pacchā āgatena bhikkhaṃ gahetvā gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1494_6: Sace manussā vā bhikkhū vā “pavisathā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin05t:1494_10: āsanasālaṃ gantvā atisamīpaṃ agantvā sabhāgaṭṭhāne ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1494_12: Sace pana yaṃ āsanaṃ tassa pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin05t:1494_15: Yāgukhajjakādīsu pana yaṃ kiñci pivitvā khāditvā vā yāva añño āgacchati,
tika-vin05t:1494_16: tāva nisinnaṃ rittahatthampi uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1495_6: sādhukaṃ sitthāni gilitvā vuḍḍhassa āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1496_6: sādhukaṃ sitthāni gilitvā vuḍḍhassa āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1496_9: ‘kenaci pariyāyena vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno āsanaṃ paṭibāhitabba’nti vadāmi,
tika-vin05t:1497_3: navakena bhikkhunā uddisantena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ uccatare vā dhammagāravena,
tika-vin05t:1497_4: therena bhikkhunā uddisāpentena samake vā āsane nisīdituṃ nīcatare vā dhammagāravenā”ti vacanato navakatarena
tika-vin05t:1497_6: vuḍḍhatarena bhikkhunā uddisāpentena nīcatarepi āsane nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1498_3: tivassantarena saha nisīditu”nti vacanato tivassantarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekāsane nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1498_4: Tivassantaro nāma yo dvīhi vassehi mahantataro vā daharataro vā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1498_5: yo pana ekena vassena mahantataro vā daharataro vā,
tika-vin05t:1498_8: ime sabbe ekasmiṃ mañce vā pīṭhe vā dve dve hutvā nisīdituṃ labhanti.
tika-vin05t:1498_11: duvaggassa mañcaṃ duvaggassa pīṭha”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1499_2: taṃ saṃhārimaṃ vā hotu asaṃhārimaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1499_3: tathārūpe api phalakakhaṇḍe anupasampannenapi saddhiṃ nisīdituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1499_10: ṭhapetvā paṇḍakaṃ mātugāmaṃ ubhatobyañjanakaṃ asamānāsanikehi saha dīghāsane nisīditu”nti vacanato pana
tika-vin05t:1499_11: dīghāsanepi paṇḍakādīhi saha nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1500_10: so gilānaṃ upaṭṭhaheyyā”ti imaṃ bhagavato anusāsaniṃ anussarantena sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1501_18: Sace na hoti upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā saddhivihāriko vā antevāsiko vā samānupajjhāyako vā samānācariyako vā,
tika-vin05t:1502_0: Vacanato yassa te upajjhāyādayo tasmiṃ vihāre natthi,
tika-vin05t:1502_6: Vāraṃ ṭhapetvā jaggantesu pana yo attano vāre na jaggati,
tika-vin05t:1502_9: Sace sakalo saṅgho ekassa bhāraṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1502_10: eko vā vattasampanno bhikkhu “ahameva jaggissāmī”ti jaggati,
tika-vin05t:1504_6: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa yathābhūtaṃ ābādhaṃ nāvikattā hoti ‘abhikkamantaṃ vā abhikkamatīti,
tika-vin05t:1504_9: uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātiko hotī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1505_0: Evaṃ vuttāni pañca ayuttaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā –
tika-vin05t:1506_6: atthakāmassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa yathābhūtaṃ ābādhaṃ āvikattā hoti ‘abhikkamantaṃ vā abhikkamatīti,
tika-vin05t:1506_9: uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ adhivāsakajātiko hotī”ti –
tika-vin05t:1509_2: aṅgehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko nālaṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-vin05t:1509_9: jegucchī hoti uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā vantaṃ vā nīhātuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1509_10: na paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ kālena kālaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṃ samādapetuṃ samuttejetuṃ sampahaṃsetu”nti –
tika-vin05t:1510_0: Evaṃ vuttāni pañca ayuttaṅgāni ārakā parivajjetvā –
tika-vin05t:1511_2: aṅgehi samannāgato gilānupaṭṭhāko alaṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-vin05t:1511_9: ajegucchī hoti uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā vantaṃ vā nīhātuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1511_10: paṭibalo hoti gilānaṃ kālena kālaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetuṃ samādapetuṃ samuttejetuṃ sampahaṃsetu”nti –
tika-vin05t:1513_1: Dhammiṃ kathaṃ karontena ca “sīlavā hi tvaṃ katakusalo,
tika-vin05t:1513_3: nanu sīlavato saggo nāma maraṇamattapaṭibaddhoyevā”ti evaṃ gilānassa bhikkhuno maraṇavaṇṇo na saṃvaṇṇetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1513_4: Sace hi tassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ sutvā āhārupacchedādinā upakkamena ekajavanavārāvasesepi āyusmiṃ antarā kālaṃ karoti,
tika-vin05t:1513_6: Paṇḍitena pana bhikkhunā iminā nayena anusiṭṭhi dātabbā “sīlavato nāma anacchariyā maggaphaluppatti,
tika-vin05t:1513_7: tasmā vihārādīsu āsattiṃ akatvā buddhagataṃ dhammagataṃ saṅghagataṃ kāyagatañca satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā manasikāre appamādo kātabbo”ti.
tika-vin05t:1513_8: Maraṇavaṇṇepi saṃvaṇṇite so tāya saṃvaṇṇanāya kañci upakkamaṃ akatvā attano dhammatāya yathāyunā yathānusandhināva marati,
tika-vin05t:1514_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato gilānena bhikkhunāpi yena kenaci upakkamena antamaso āhārupacchedanenapi attā na māretabbo.
tika-vin05t:1514_5: Yopi gilāno vijjamāne bhesajje ca upaṭṭhākesu ca maritukāmo āhāraṃ upacchindati,
tika-vin05t:1514_10: Sace so “ayaṃ attabhāvo paṭijaggiyamānopi na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t:1514_15: ayañca me visesādhigamo hatthappatto viya dissatī”ti upacchindati,
tika-vin05t:1515_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato āsanaṃ anupaparikkhitvā na nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1515_11: Yampi manussā sayaṃ hatthena akkamitvā “idha bhante nisīdathā”ti denti,
tika-vin05t:1515_13: Sacepi paṭhamameva āgantvāpi nisinnā pacchā uddhaṃ vā adho vā saṅkamanti,
tika-vin05t:1515_15: Yampi tanukena vatthena yathā talaṃ dissati,
tika-vin05t:1515_18: Yaṃ pana paṭikacceva pāvārakojavādīhi atthataṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1515_20: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “ghanasāṭakenapi atthate yasmiṃ vali na paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:1516_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato hasādhippāyena pāsāṇo na pavaṭṭetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1516_6: aññampi yaṃ kiñci dārukhaṇḍaṃ vā iṭṭhakakhaṇḍaṃ vā hatthena vā yantena vā paṭivijjhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1516_7: Cetiyādīnaṃ atthāya pāsāṇādayo hasantā hasantā pavaṭṭentipi khipantipi ukkhipantipi,
tika-vin05t:1516_9: aññampi īdisaṃ navakammaṃ vā karontā bhaṇḍakaṃ vā dhovantā rukkhaṃ vā dhovanadaṇḍakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā paṭivijjhanti, vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1516_10: bhattavissaggakālādīsu kāke vā soṇe vā kaṭṭhaṃ vā kathalaṃ vā khipitvā palāpenti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1517_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato vane aggi na dātabbo.
tika-vin05t:1517_5: Sace pana “etthantare yo koci satto maratū”ti aggiṃ deti,
tika-vin05t:1517_10: “Yaṃ kiñci allasukkhaṃ saindriyānindriyaṃ ḍayhatū”ti aggiṃ dentassa vatthuvasena pārājikathullaccayapācittiyadukkaṭāni veditabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1518_1: tasmā araññe vanakammikehi vā dinnaṃ sayaṃ vā uṭṭhitaṃ aggiṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “tiṇakuṭiyo mā vinassantū”ti tassa aggino paṭiaggiṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1518_2: yena saddhiṃ āgacchanto aggi ekato hutvā nirupādāno nibbāti.
tika-vin05t:1518_3: “Parittampi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tiṇakuṭikānaṃ samantā bhūmitacchanaṃ parikhākhaṇanaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1518_4: yathā āgato aggi upādānaṃ alabhitvā nibbāti,
tika-vin05t:1518_5: etañca sabbaṃ uṭṭhiteyeva aggismiṃ asati anupasampanne sayampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1518_7: udakena pana nibbāpentehi appāṇakameva udakaṃ āsiñcitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1519_1: Assaddhesu micchādiṭṭhikulesu sakkaccaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā anupaparikkhitvā neva attanā paribhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1519_3: Visamissampi hi tāni kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ denti.
tika-vin05t:1519_4: Yampi ābhidosikaṃ bhattaṃ vā khajjakaṃ vā tato labhati,
tika-vin05t:1519_6: Apihitavatthumpi hi sappavicchikādīhi adhisayitaṃ chaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ tāni kulāni denti.
tika-vin05t:1519_8: Sarīre rogaṭṭhānāni puñchitvā ṭhapitabhattampi hi tāni dātabbaṃ maññantīti.
tika-vin05t:1520_6: Mahāsumatthero tāva āha “yaṃ gopakassa paricchinditvā dinnaṃ hoti ‘ettakaṃ divase divase gaṇhā’ti,
tika-vin05t:1520_9: Mahāpadumatthero panāha “kiṃ gopakānaṃ paṇṇaṃ āropetvā nimittasaññaṃ vā katvā dinnaṃ atthi,
tika-vin05t:1520_13: Kurundaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “manussānaṃ ārāmaṃ vā aññaṃ vā phalāphalaṃ dārakā rakkhanti,
tika-vin05t:1520_16: Saṅghike pana cetiyassa santake ca keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantasseva dānaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1520_18: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana “yaṃ gihīnaṃ ārāmarakkhakā bhikkhūnaṃ denti,
tika-vin05t:1520_20: Bhikkhusaṅghassa ārāmagopakā yaṃ attano bhatiyā khaṇḍitvā denti,
tika-vin05t:1520_22: Yopi upaḍḍhārāmaṃ vā kecideva rukkhe vā bhatiṃ labhitvā rakkhati,
tika-vin05t:1520_24: keṇiyā gahetvā rakkhantassa pana sabbampi vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1521_2: phalavāre ca sampatte aññesaṃ abhāvaṃ disvā corikāya attanāva khādanti,
tika-vin05t:1521_3: tattha āgantukehi ghaṇṭiṃ paharitvā bhājetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1521_4: Yattha pana āvāsikā rukkhe rakkhitvā phalavāre sampatte bhājetvā khādanti,
tika-vin05t:1521_10: Ye pana tathā aniyametvā āvāsikā ca te rakkhitvā gopetvā corikāya paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin05t:1521_13: āvāsikā ca ne rakkhitvā gopetvā sammā upanenti,
tika-vin05t:1521_15: Mahāpaccariyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ niyametvā dinnaṃ theyyacittena paribhuñjanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā kāretabbo,
tika-vin05t:1521_18: taṃ paribhogavaseneva bhājetvā paribhuñjantassa thullaccayañca bhaṇḍadeyyañcā”ti.
tika-vin05t:1522_4: saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apalokanakammaṃ katvā piṇḍapātepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1522_5: Senāsanena gilānapaccayena vā kilamantesu saṅghasuṭṭhutāya apalokanakammaṃ katvā tadatthāyapi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1522_6: Odissa piṇḍapātatthāya ca gilānapaccayatthāya ca dinnepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1522_7: Odissa senāsanatthāya dinnaṃ pana garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1522_11: ettha rājarogacorabhayādīhi aññattha gacchantānaṃ vihārā palujjanti,
tika-vin05t:1522_13: senāsanapaccayaṃ pana nissāya yāpetuṃ sakkā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1522_14: evarūpe kāle senāsanaṃ vissajjetvāpi senāsanajagganatthāya paribhogo bhagavatā anuññāto.
tika-vin05t:1522_15: Tasmā ekaṃ vā dve vā varasenāsanāni ṭhapetvā itarāni lāmakakoṭiyā piṇḍapātatthāya vissajjetuṃ vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:1523_0: Yo pana ārāmo catupaccayatthāya niyametvā dinno,
tika-vin05t:1523_6: Ye pana vetanaṃ labhitvā ārāmeyeva gehaṃ katvā vasantā rakkhanti,
tika-vin05t:1523_7: te ce āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāḷikeraṃ vā tālapakkaṃ vā denti,
tika-vin05t:1523_8: yaṃ tesaṃ saṅghena anuññātaṃ hoti “divase divase ettakaṃ nāma khādathā”ti,
tika-vin05t:1523_10: tato uttari tesaṃ dentānampi gahetuṃ na vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1523_11: Yo pana ārāmaṃ keṇiyā gahetvā saṅghassa catupaccayatthāya kappiyabhaṇḍameva deti,
tika-vin05t:1523_13: Cetiyassa padīpatthāya vā khaṇḍaphullapaṭisaṅkharaṇatthāya vā dinnaārāmopi jaggitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1523_15: Vetanañca panettha cetiyasantakampi saṅghasantakampi dātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1523_16: Etampi ārāmaṃ vetanena tattheva vasitvā rakkhantānañca keṇiyā gahetvā kappiyabhaṇḍadāyakānañca tatthajātakaphaladānaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1524_1: Dhammikarakkhaṃ yācantena atītaṃ anāgataṃ vā ārabbha odissa ācikkhituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1524_6: Kathaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti?
tika-vin05t:1524_7: Bhikkhūnaṃ vihāre gāmadārakā vā dhuttādayo vā ye keci anācāraṃ ācaranti,
tika-vin05t:1524_11: bhikkhu vohārike upasaṅkamitvā “amhākaṃ vihāre idaṃ nāma kata”nti vadati.
tika-vin05t:1524_13: Evaṃ atītaṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1524_15: Tañce sutvā te vohārikā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1524_20: “Kenā”ti vutte pana “asukenāti vattuṃ amhākaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1524_27: Evaṃ vutte sacepi te vohārikā kārake gavesitvā tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1524_30: Parikkhāraṃ harante disvā tesaṃ anatthakāmatāya “coro coro”ti vattumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1524_31: Evaṃ vuttepi hi yaṃ tesaṃ daṇḍaṃ karonti,
tika-vin05t:1524_33: Attano vacanakaraṃ pana “iminā me parikkhāro gahito,
tika-vin05t:1524_35: mā cassa daṇḍaṃ karohī”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1524_36: Dāsadāsīvāpiādīnampi atthāya aḍḍaṃ karonti ayaṃ akappiyaaḍḍo nāma,
tika-vin05t:1525_0: Kathaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti?
tika-vin05t:1525_1: Vuttanayeneva parehi anācārādīsu katesu bhikkhu vohārike evaṃ vadati “amhākaṃ vihāre idañcidañca karonti,
tika-vin05t:1525_3: “Kena evaṃ kata”nti vutte ca “asukena ca asukena cā”ti ācikkhati.
tika-vin05t:1525_4: Evaṃ anāgataṃ ārabbha odissa ācikkhanā hoti,
tika-vin05t:1525_6: Tesañhi daṇḍe kate purimanayeneva sabbaṃ bhikkhussa gīvā,
tika-vin05t:1525_8: Sace vohārikā “bhikkhūnaṃ vihāre evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karontānaṃ imaṃ nāma daṇḍaṃ karomā”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā
tika-vin05t:1525_12: Vihārasīmāya rukkhādīni chindantānaṃ vāsipharasuādīni gahetvā pāsāṇehi koṭṭenti,
tika-vin05t:1526_1: Uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsaṃ vā tirokuṭṭe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍetuṃ vā chaḍḍāpetuṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1526_2: Cattāripi vatthūni ekapayogena chaḍḍentassa ekameva dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1526_6: Oloketvā vā avalañje vā uccārādīni chaḍḍentassa anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1526_7: Yampi manussānaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ ropimaṃ khettaṃ hotu nāḷikerādiārāmo vā,
tika-vin05t:1526_8: tatthāpi yattha katthaci ropimaharitaṭṭhāne etāni vatthūni chaḍḍetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1526_10: Khette vā ārāme vā nisīditvā bhuñjamāno ucchuādīni vā khādamāno gacchanto ucchiṭṭhodakacalakādīni haritaṭṭhāne chaḍḍeti,
tika-vin05t:1526_11: antamaso udakaṃ pivitvā matthakacchinnanāḷikerampi chaḍḍeti, dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1526_12: Kasitaṭṭhāne nikkhittabīje aṅkure uṭṭhitepi avuṭṭhitepi dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:1526_13: Anikkhittabījesu pana khettakoṇādīsu vā asañjātaropimesu khettamariyādādīsu vā chaḍḍetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1526_15: Manussesu sassaṃ uddharitvā gatesu chaḍḍitakhettaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin05t:1526_17: Yattha pana “lāyitampi pubbaṇṇādi puna uṭṭhahissatī”ti rakkhanti,
tika-vin05t:1527_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nahāyantena rukkhe vā nahānatitthe nikhanitvā ṭhapitatthambhe vā iṭṭhakasilādārukuṭṭānaṃ
tika-vin05t:1527_5: aññatarasmiṃ kuṭṭe vā kāyo na ghaṃsetabbo.
tika-vin05t:1528_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aṭṭānepi nahāyituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1528_5: Aṭṭānaṃ nāma rukkhaṃ phalakaṃ viya tacchetvā aṭṭhapadākārena rājiyo chinditvā nahānatitthe nikhananti,
tika-vin05t:1528_6: tattha cuṇṇāni ākiritvā manussā kāyaṃ ghaṃsanti.
tika-vin05t:1529_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nahānatitthe ṭhapitena dārumayahatthena cuṇṇāni gahetvā manussā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti,
tika-vin05t:1530_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato kuruvindakasuttiyāpi nahāyituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1530_5: Kuruvindakasutti nāma kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇāni lākhāya bandhitvā kataguḷikakalāpako vuccati,
tika-vin05t:1530_6: yaṃ ubhosu antesu gahetvā sarīraṃ ghaṃsanti.
tika-vin05t:1531_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aññamaññaṃ sarīrena ghaṃsituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1532_7: gilānassa akatamallaka”nti vacanato makaradaṇḍake chinditvā mallakamūlasaṇṭhānena kataṃ “mallaka”nti vuccati,
tika-vin05t:1533_2: ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇika”nti vacanato ukkāsikaṃ puthupāṇikañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1533_4: tasmā nahāyantassa yassa kassaci nahānasāṭakavaṭṭiyā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1533_6: tasmā sabbesaṃ hatthena piṭṭhiparikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1534_1: udakatitthaṃ gantvā yattha vā tattha vā cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā vegena ṭhitakeneva na otaritabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1534_2: sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā khāṇugumbalatādīni vavatthapetvā tikkhattuṃ ukkāsitvā avakujja
tika-vin05t:1534_6: udakante ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvā sace ninnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-vin05t:1534_10: Otarantena saṇikaṃ nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā vīciṃ anuṭṭhapentena saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1534_12: Ummujjantenapi saddaṃ akarontena saṇikaṃ ummujjitvā nahānapariyosāne udakante ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ
tika-vin05t:1534_13: parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya suparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvāva ṭhātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1535_11: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato kaṇṇapiḷandhanādi yaṃ kiñci ābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1535_12: Tattha vallikāti kaṇṇato nikkhantamuttolambakādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1535_14: yaṃ kiñci kaṇṇapiḷandhanaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1536_7: dvemāsikaṃ vā duvaṅgulaṃ vā”ti vacanato sace kesā antodvemāse dvaṅgulaṃ pāpuṇanti,
tika-vin05t:1536_13: tato oraṃ pana na vaṭṭanabhāvo nāma natthi.
tika-vin05t:1537_7: ābādhapaccayā kattarikāya kese chedāpetu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā kattarikāya kese chedāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1538_8: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato maṇḍanatthāya kocchādīhi kesā na osaṇṭhetabbā,
tika-vin05t:1538_9: uddhalomena pana anulomanipātanatthaṃ hatthaṃ temetvā sīsaṃ puñchitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1539_2: ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1539_7: ābādhapaccayā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhanimittaṃ oloketu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā ādāse vā udakapatte vā mukhaṃ na oloketabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1539_8: Ettha ca kaṃsapattādīnipi yesu mukhanimittaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin05t:1539_12: Ābādhapaccayā pana “sañchavi nu kho me vaṇo,
tika-vin05t:1539_15: no”ti evaṃ āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokanatthampi vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1540_13: ābādhapaccayā mukhaṃ ālimpitu”nti vacanato ābādhaṃ vinā mukhavilimpanādi na kātabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1541_2: naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā vāditaṃ vā dassanāya gantabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1541_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato naccādiṃ dassanāya na gantabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1541_5: Ettha ca naccanti naṭādayo vā naccantu soṇḍā vā antamaso morasūvamakkaṭādayopi,
tika-vin05t:1541_7: tasmā antamaso moranaccampi dassanāya gacchantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1541_8: Sayampi naccantassa vā naccāpentassa vā dukkaṭameva.
tika-vin05t:1541_9: Gītanti naṭādīnaṃ vā gītaṃ hotu ariyānaṃ parinibbānakāle ratanattayaguṇūpasañhitaṃ sādhukīḷitagītaṃ vā
tika-vin05t:1542_7: pacchimā janatā diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjati. Ime kho,
tika-vin05t:1542_9: pañca ādīnavā āyatakena gītassarena dhammaṃ gāyantassa. Na,
tika-vin05t:1543_0: Vacanato āyatakena gītassarena dhammopi na gāyitabbo.
tika-vin05t:1544_0: Āyatako nāma gītassaro taṃ taṃ vattaṃ bhinditvā akkharāni vināsetvā pavatto.
tika-vin05t:1544_4: taṃ vināsetvā atidīghaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1544_8: sarabhañña”nti vacanato pana sarena dhammaṃ bhaṇituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1544_9: Sarabhaññe kira taraṅgavattadhotakavattagalitavattādīni dvattiṃsa vattāni atthi,
tika-vin05t:1544_12: Sabbesaṃ padabyañjanaṃ avināsetvā vikāraṃ akatvā samaṇasāruppena caturassena nayena pavattanaṃyeva lakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1545_0: Vāditaṃ nāma tantibaddhādivādanīyabhaṇḍaṃ vāditaṃ vā hotu kuṭabherivāditaṃ vā antamaso udakabherivāditampi,
tika-vin05t:1545_2: Yaṃ pana niṭṭhubhanto vā sāsaṅke vā ṭhito accharikaṃ vā phoṭeti,
tika-vin05t:1545_9: vīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā passatopi āpattiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1545_10: Salākabhattādīnaṃ vā atthāya aññena vā kenaci karaṇīyena gantvā gataṭṭhāne passati vā suṇāti vā, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1545_11: Āpadāsu tādisena upaddavena upadduto samajjaṭṭhānaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin05t:1545_12: evaṃ pavisitvā passantassa suṇantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1545_14: “tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upahāraṃ karomā”ti vutte sampaṭicchitumpi na labhati.
tika-vin05t:1545_15: “Tumhākaṃ cetiyassa upaṭṭhānaṃ karomā”ti vutte pana “upaṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ nāma sundara”nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1546_4: āpatti thullaccayassā”ti vacanato aṅgajātaṃ chindantassa thullaccayaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1546_5: aññaṃ pana kaṇṇanāsāaṅguliādiṃ yaṃ kiñci chindantassa tādisaṃ vā dukkhaṃ uppādentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1546_6: Ahikīṭadaṭṭhādīsu pana aññābādhapaccayā vā lohitaṃ vā mocentassa chindantassa vā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1547_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato gihīnaṃ vikubbaniddhiṃ dassetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1548_13: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato suvaṇṇamayādipatto na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1548_14: Sacepi gihī bhattagge suvaṇṇataṭṭikādīsu byañjanaṃ katvā upanāmenti,
tika-vin05t:1548_16: Phalikamayakācamayakaṃsamayāni pana taṭṭikādīni bhājanāni puggalikaparibhogeneva na vaṭṭanti,
tika-vin05t:1548_22: dve patte ayopattaṃ mattikāpatta”nti dveyeva ca pattā anuññātā.
tika-vin05t:1549_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato lābukaṭāhaṃ pariharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1549_5: taṃ labhitvā pana tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1550_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato chavasīsamayopi patto na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1551_2: pattādhāraka”nti vacanato bhūmidārudaṇḍavaalavettādīhi kate bhūmiādhārake dārudaṇḍaādhārake ca pattaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1551_3: Ettha ca “bhūmiādhārake tayo daṇḍādhārake dve patte uparūpari ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kurundiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1551_4: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ “bhūmiādhārake tiṇṇaṃ pattānaṃ anokāso,
tika-vin05t:1551_7: Bhamakoṭisadiso pana dāruādhārako tīhi daṇḍakehi baddho,
tika-vin05t:1552_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato ālindakamiḍḍhikādīnaṃ ante ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1553_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato bāhirapasse katāya tanukamiḍḍhikāya antepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t:1553_7: coḷaka”nti vacanato coḷakaṃ pattharitvā tattha ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1553_8: Tasmiṃ pana asati kaṭasārake vā taṭṭikāya vā mattikāya vā paribhaṇḍakatāya bhūmiyā yattha na dussati,
tika-vin05t:1553_10: Paṃsurajādīsu pana kharabhūmiyaṃ vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1554_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato nāgadantādīsu yattha katthaci laggetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1555_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato bhaṇḍakaṭṭhapanatthameva vā kataṃ hotu nisīdanasayanatthaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1555_5: yattha katthaci mañce vā pīṭhe vā ṭhapentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1555_6: aññena pana bhaṇḍakena saddhiṃ bandhitvā ṭhapetuṃ,
tika-vin05t:1555_9: Sace pana mañco vā pīṭhaṃ vā ukkhipitvā cīvaravaṃsādīsu aṭṭakacchannena ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin05t:1555_11: Aṃsavaṭṭanakena aṃsakūṭe laggetvā aṅke ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1555_12: chatte bhattapūropi aṃsakūṭe laggitapattopi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1555_13: Bhaṇḍakena pana saddhiṃ bandhitvā aṭṭakaṃ katvā vā ṭhapite yo koci ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1556_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pattahatthena kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1556_5: Ettha ca na kevalaṃ yassa patto hatthe,
tika-vin05t:1556_7: Na kevalañca kavāṭameva paṇāmetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1556_8: apica kho pana hatthe vā piṭṭhipāde vā yattha yatthaci sarīrāvayave pattasmiṃ sati hatthena vā pādena
tika-vin05t:1556_9: vā sīsena vā yena kenaci sarīrāvayavena kavāṭaṃ vā paṇāmetuṃ ghaṭikaṃ vā ukkhipituṃ sūciṃ vā kuñcikāya
tika-vin05t:1556_11: aṃsakūṭe pana pattaṃ laggetvā yathāsukhaṃ avāpurituṃ labhati.
tika-vin05t:1557_2: calakāni vā aṭṭhikāni vā ucchiṭṭhodakaṃ vā pattena nīharitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1557_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato calakādīni pattena nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1557_8: Etesu yaṃ kiñci pattena nīharantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1557_9: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā hatthaṃ dhovitumpi na labhati.
tika-vin05t:1557_10: Hatthadhotapādadhotaudakampi patte ākiritvā nīharituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1557_11: anucchiṭṭhaṃ suddhapattaṃ ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1557_12: vāmahatthena panettha udakaṃ āsiñcitvā ekaṃ udakagaṇḍusaṃ gahetvā ucchiṭṭhahatthena gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1557_14: hatthaṃ pana bahiudakena vikkhāletvā gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1557_15: Macchamaṃsaphalāphalādīni ca khādanto yaṃ tattha aṭṭhiṃ vā calakaṃ vā chaḍḍetukāmo hoti,
tika-vin05t:1557_19: Aṭṭhikakaṇṭakādīni tattheva katvā hatthena luñcitvā khādituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1557_20: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci puna khāditukāmo patte ṭhapetuṃ na labhati,
tika-vin05t:1558_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato sabbapaṃsukūlikena na bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1558_5: Ettha pana cīvarañca mañcapīṭhañca paṃsukūlaṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1559_2: addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā parissāvanaṃ yāciyamānena na dātabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1559_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aparissāvanakassa yācamānassa parissāvanaṃ adātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1559_5: Yo pana attano hatthe parissāvane vijjamānepi yācati,
tika-vin05t:1560_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato aparissāvanakena maggo na gantabbo.
tika-vin05t:1560_5: Sacepi na hoti parissāvanaṃ vā dhammakaraṇaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1561_3: Daṇḍaparissāvanaṃ nāma yattha rajakānaṃ khāraparissāvanaṃ viya catūsu pādesu baddhanisseṇikāya sāṭakaṃ bandhitvā majjhe daṇḍake udakaṃ āsiñcanti,
tika-vin05t:1562_3: Ottharakaṃ nāma yaṃ udake ottharitvā ghaṭakena udakaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin05t:1562_4: tañhi catūsu daṇḍakesu vatthaṃ bandhitvā udake cattāro khāṇuke nikhanitvā tesu bandhitvā sabbapariyante
tika-vin05t:1562_5: udakato mocetvā majjhe ottharitvā ghaṭena udakaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin05t:1563_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”tiādivacanato na naggena naggo abhivādetabbo,
tika-vin05t:1564_2: tisso paṭicchādiyo jantāgharapaṭicchādiṃ udakapaṭicchādiṃ vatthapaṭicchādi”nti vacanato tisso paṭicchādiyo vaṭṭanti.
tika-vin05t:1564_3: Ettha ca jantāgharapaṭicchādi udakapaṭicchādi ca parikammaṃ karontasseva vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1565_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato pupphehi santhatesu sayanesu na sayitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1565_5: gandhagandhaṃ pana gahetvā kavāṭe pañcaṅguliṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati pupphaṃ gahetvā vihāre ekamantaṃ nikkhipituṃ.
tika-vin05t:1566_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato āsittakūpadhāne ṭhapetvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1566_5: Āsittakūpadhānanti tambalohena vā rajatena vā katāya peḷāya etaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1567_3: maḷorika”nti vacanato maḷorikāya ṭhapetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1567_6: Ādhārakasaṅkhepagamanato hi paṭṭhāya chiddaṃ viddhampi aviddhampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
tika-vin05t:1568_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ādivacanato na ekabhājane bhuñjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1568_6: Sace pana eko bhikkhu bhājanato phalaṃ vā pūpaṃ vā gahetvā gacchati,
tika-vin05t:1568_7: tasmiṃ apagate itarassa sesakaṃ bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1568_8: itarassapi tasmiṃ khīṇe puna gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1569_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ādivacanato na ekamañce nipajjitabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1569_6: Vavatthānaṃ pana dassetvā majjhe kāsāvaṃ vā kattarayaṭṭhiṃ vā antamaso kāyabandhanampi ṭhapetvā nipajjantānaṃ anāpatti.
tika-vin05t:1569_9: Saṃhārimānaṃ pāvārattharaṇakaṭasārakādīnaṃ ekaṃ antaṃ attharitvā ekaṃ pārupitvā nipajjantānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1570_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato na celasanthāro akkamitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1570_7: gihīnaṃ maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena celappaṭikaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato pana kāci itthī apagatagabbhā vā hoti garugabbhā vā,
tika-vin05t:1570_8: evarūpesu ṭhānesu maṅgalatthāya yāciyamānena akkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1570_11: dhotapādakaṃ akkamitu”nti vacanato pādadhovanaṭṭhāne dhotehi pādehi akkamanatthāya atthatapaccattharaṇaṃ akkamituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1571_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato katakaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1571_5: Katakaṃ nāma padumakaṇṇikākāraṃ pādaghaṃsanatthaṃ kaṇṭake uṭṭhāpetvā kataṃ.
tika-vin05t:1571_6: Taṃ vaṭṭaṃ vā hotu caturassādibhedaṃ vā,
tika-vin05t:1571_12: tisso pādaghaṃsaniyo sakkharaṃ kathalaṃ samuddapheṇaka”nti vacanato sakkharādīhi pādaghaṃsanaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1572_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato cāmarivālehi katabījanī na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1572_8: Anujānāmi bhikkhave tisso bījaniyo vākamayaṃ usīramayaṃ morapiñchamayaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1572_13: Tālavaṇṭaṃ pana tālapaṇṇehi vā kataṃ hotu veḷudantavilīvehi vā morapiñchehi vā cammavikatīhi vā,
tika-vin05t:1573_7: gilānassa chatta”nti vacanato agilānena chattaṃ na dhāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1573_8: Yassa pana kāyaḍāho vā pittakopo vā hoti cakkhu vā dubbalaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1573_9: añño vā koci ābādho vinā chattena uppajjati,
tika-vin05t:1573_10: tassa gāme vā araññe vā chattaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1573_11: Vasse pana cīvaraguttatthampi vāḷamigacorabhayesu attaguttatthampi vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1573_15: agilānenapi ārāme ārāmūpacāre chattaṃ dhāretu”nti vacanato pana agilānassapi ārāmaārāmūpacāresu chattaṃ dhāretuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1574_7: maṃsappamāṇena nakhaṃ chinditu”nti vacanato dīghā nakhā chinditabbā. “Na,
tika-vin05t:1574_14: malamattaṃ apakaḍḍhitu”nti vacanato vīsatipi nakhe likhitamaṭṭhe kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t:1575_7: ābādhapaccayā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetu”nti vacanato gaṇḍavaṇādiābādhaṃ vinā sambādhe lomaṃ saṃharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati. “Na,
tika-vin05t:1575_11: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato saṇḍāsena nāsikālomaṃ saṃharāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1575_19: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato palitaṃ gāhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1575_20: Yaṃ pana bhamukāya vā nalāṭe vā dāṭhikāya vā uggantvā bībhacchaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1575_21: tādisaṃ lomaṃ palitaṃ vā apalitaṃ vā gāhāpetuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1576_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato akāyabandhanena gāmo na pavisitabbo,
tika-vin05t:1577_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti ādivacanato hatthisoṇḍādivasena gihinivatthaṃ na nivāsetabbaṃ,
tika-vin05t:1577_6: mallakammakarādayo viya kacchaṃ bandhitvā na nivāsetabbaṃ.
tika-vin05t:1577_7: Evaṃ nivāsetuṃ gilānassapi maggappaṭipannassapi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1577_8: Yampi maggaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ vā dve vā koṇe ukkhipitvā antaravāsakassa upari lagganti,
tika-vin05t:1577_9: anto vā ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ tathā nivāsetvā bahi aparaṃ nivāsenti,
tika-vin05t:1577_11: Gilāno pana antokāsāvassa ovaṭṭikaṃ dassetvā aparaṃ upari nivāsetuṃ labhati,
tika-vin05t:1577_12: agilānena dve nivāsentena saguṇaṃ katvā nivāsetabbāni.
tika-vin05t:1578_4: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vacanato ubhatokājaṃ harituṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t:1578_7: ekatokājaṃ antarākājaṃ sīsabhāraṃ khandhabhāraṃ kaṭibhāraṃ olambaka”nti vacanato ekatokājādiṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati.
